CCL Industries

A global specialty packaging pioneer, CCL Industries is the largest label company in the world with headquarters in Toronto, Canada and Framingham, Massachusetts.

Established 1951

home-slider-02
Home & Personal Care

Labels that deliver iconic branding solutions globally plus highly decorated extruded, laminated and labeled tubes. Uniquely shaped and decorated aluminum aerosols in North America.

Premium Food & Beverage

Premium look decorating solutions for brands in glass and plastic packages alongside promotional aluminum bottles for a sustainable world.

Delivering digital quality assurance and special products to the global pharmaceutical, chemical and other highly regulated industries.

CCL Design supplies long-life, high-performance labels and other products to automotive, electronics and durable goods OEMs.

CCL Secure

CCL Secure supplies polymer bank note substrate, pressure sensitive stamps, passport components and other security products to government institutions and to corporations for brand protection.

https://checkpointsystems.com/us

home-slider-09

CCL Statistics

A global specialty packaging pioneer, CCL is the largest label company in the world and provides innovative solutions to the Home & Personal Care, Premium Food & Beverage, Healthcare & Specialty, Automotive & Durables and Consumer markets worldwide. The Company is divided into four reporting segments: CCL , Avery, Checkpoint and Innovia.

With approximately 26,000 dedicated employees, we operate 213 state-of-the-art manufacturing facilities in North America, South America, Europe, Asia, Australia and Africa.

SUSTAINABILITY
REDUCING OUR IMPACT.

At Winpak, sustainable practices are part of our daily work processes and are incorporated into our guidelines and strategic planning. We create effective methods that incorporate sustainability initiatives into our daily work processes and regularly examine our progress for reporting and improvement opportunities.

Our employees and industry partners are fully engaged in creating innovative approaches to positively impact the economic, social and environmental aspects of our products, services and manufacturing practices.

LEARN MORE

Winpak is Exhibiting at MD&M West 2025

January 9, 2025 - We are excited to announce that Winpak will be exhibiting at MD&M West 2025, the premier event for medical design and manufacturing! Join us from February 11-13, 2025, at the Anaheim Convention Center in California to explore our latest advancements in sustainable and high-performance packaging solutions for the medical industry.

Our team will be at booth #2331, showcasing cutting-edge materials and technologies designed to enhance product safety, extend shelf life, and meet the evolving needs of the healthcare industry. Whether you're looking to optimize your packaging solutions or discover new innovations, Winpak is here to partner with you every step of the way.

Rooted in sustainability – At Atlantic Packaging, sustainability isn’t a trend; it’s woven into our DNA. We have always created high-quality packaging that is environmentally responsible. As innovators, we are committed to driving sustainability – at our company, within our industry, and for our customers – by creating packaging that is respectful of resources and our planet.

Total Package Solutions

At Atlantic, we strive to understand the customer’s packaging requirements. We aim to tailor every experience best suited for each individual client. Our services go beyond delivering boxes: we deliver on customer satisfaction by meeting requirements through customized solutions.

We provide end-to-end packaging solutions to our clients. From corrugated packaging to recyclable paper bag products and retail displays, we understand the market like no other. We oversee all stages of product development from ideation to deployment. We take charge right from recycling material for manufacturing to finding the best logistics and supply management solutions for your business.

We provide more than just packaging – we deliver an experience.

About Us

Atlantic Packaging is a company with rich history, culture, and an indomitable spirit to do good. For the past 75 years, Atlantic Packaging has worked towards preserving the environment and ensuring not a single tree is cut to manufacture boxes. We are proud to state that we save close to 14 million trees every year and continue to work towards achieving a greener planet!

Glance at the spirited, energetic team that drives Atlantic forward. Our work culture is inclusive and we value employees above all else.

Our Testimonial

“We have been working with Atlantic for over 10 years and they have always come across as a solution-driven organization. Their packaging solutions and technical representation have helped us to optimize our production process and they have proven many times over to be an asset supplier to our company.

Atlantic takes customer care to the next level. They have multiple points of communication and are always available to answer questions no matter what time of the day.

Atlantic provides 100% recyclable packaging solutions that reduce our carbon footprints and enhance our value of social responsibility. In a nutshell, we are very pleased with our association with Atlantic Packaging Products Ltd.”

Grace Cai
Strategic Sourcing Manager - Ya YA Foods Corp.

“We have been buying from Atlantic for the past several years and are appreciative of the partnership we have built together. Atlantic's prices have remained competitive and their customer service and communication is unparalleled. They work collaboratively with our team to seamlessly create drawings, artwork, and material selection providing value-added input to help us achieve the requirements of our boxes, while meeting all committed production deliveries. As a provider of pork products, our customer demand fluctuates seasonally and sometimes unpredictably, yet Atlantic has supported our changing business requirements flawlessly. Atlantic provides the flexibility and quality we need and I do not hesitate to strongly recommend them as your choice packaging supplier. By families. For families.”

Ashley Whittington
Purchasing Team Leader - Conestoga Meats™

“Atlantic has proven themselves a very reliable partner, understanding our needs and providing a sustainable volume with viable options that allow room for growth.”

Kawartha Dairy Limited

Safety Superheroes: Protecting Our Team and Customers
November 7, 2024
Safety Superheroes: Protecting Our Team and Customers
This Halloween, I dressed up as a Safety Superhero. Maybe not a big stretch for me, but I had some fun with it! It got me thinking—what would a Safety Superhero look like? For inspiration, I used the word "Safety." Safety isn’t just about us internally—it also impacts our customers. When we create a safe workplace, we ensure that everything from our processes to our products meets high standards. This helps us build trust with…
Psychology of Color in Digital Printing: Impact on Marketing and Branding
June 9, 2024
Psychology of Color in Digital Printing: Impact on Marketing and Branding
Within the sphere of digital printing for packaging, color transcends mere visual appeal, serving as an essential mechanism that moulds consumer attitudes, behaviours, and choices. Grasping the significance of color psychology in digital printing plays a critical role for brands looking to elevate their marketing and branding initiatives. One study substantiates the pivotal role of color in the packaging industry, emphasizing that an understanding of color psychology can significantly improve packaging design to boost product…
Digital Printing in the Food Industry: Edible Printing and Customized Culinary Creations
May 9, 2024
Digital Printing in the Food Industry: Edible Printing and Customized Culinary Creations
In recent years, the food industry has witnessed an innovative transformation that merges the worlds of culinary art and digital printing technology. With the ability to print complex designs and shapes, this technology opens doors to new and exciting food experiences. Beyond demonstrating its exceptional capabilities, digital print for food packaging offers unparalleled customization and flexibility that traditional preparation methods cannot match. This level of customization and efficiency can lead to significant cost savings and…

Your success is our business

Employees, customers and suppliers alike all notice the same thing: it’s different at Hood Packaging. We are more relational than transactional. We are exceptionally reliable and extremely dependable. Work here and you will have a job for life in a thriving environment. Do business with us and enjoy national pricing with local service. Plus, you always get to talk with a real person. Always.

Not a job, a career

Imagine going to work with a smile on your face, getting treated like family, and being handsomely rewarded for proudly helping others. If that sounds like your kind of job, then we are your kind of company. Because at Hood Packaging, we also mold long, rewarding careers.

See available opportunities >
We have you covered

We’re also particularly good at listening to our customers and suppliers. When they asked for more than just products, we developed technical advisers to help their lines run better and faster. With our 22 plant locations and flexible production capabilities, we have North America covered. Think of us as a multiple supplier, yet all under one roof. Whenever you need a better package, we have you covered.

Who is Stanpac?

Stanpac is a manufacturer of packaging supplies for the dairy, food and beverage industries. We love dairy and specialize in ice cream packaging, manufacturing food containers and paper board ice cream cups.

Stanpac’s state-of-the-art glass bottle printing facility allows us to decorate virtually any glass container. Our glass bottle decorating showcases your product in an exciting and distinctive way that will position your package –beer, spirits, wine, dairy, or food – apart from the rest.

Visit our general store for wholesale prices on ice cream containers, refillable glass milk bottles, paper hot cups and lids, and take-out containers.

We can help you measure – and achieve – your goals.

Service de conception et design

Mitchel Lincoln est le fabricant d’emballages en carton ondulé le plus productif du Québec—boîtes, présentoirs et feuilles. PILIERS STRATÉGIQUES
Expérience Client

Nous proposons des solutions personnalisées avec une équipe de service dévouée pour une communication transparente avec le client, de la livraison jusqu’au service après-vente.

Excellence Opérationnelle

Nous favorisons l’excellence opérationnelle en garantissant une performance de coût, des normes de production strictes et un respect accru de la qualité du produit.

Innovation

Nous investissons dans les plus récentes technologies et processus pour innover et trouver de nouvelles solutions pour nos produits. Nous effectuons des audits régulièrement de nos emballages dans le but d’améliorer l’efficacité et réduire les coûts.

Intégration verticale

Innovation continue dans le papier et le carton, avec quatre machines opérant à Toronto pour assurer un approvisionnement sécurisé et un contrôle direct de la chaîne d’approvisionnement.

Commercial Print
From Custom Boxes to Custom Envelopes we have everything you need to create your Custom Packaging Solution!

Our Packaging Solutions include ecommerce packaging, custom boxes, labels and custom envelopes. As a top envelope supplier and packaging company in North America, our team will work with you to create a custom packaging solution that meets all your needs and provide an outstanding representation of your brand. Your packaging solutions should cater to your business; we develop custom boxes and custom envelopes using innovative ideas to deliver your branding message. We collaborate with customers from a wide variety of industries including pharmaceutical, health & beauty, ecommerce, nutraceutical, food & beverage, apparel, electronics and many more!

Your packaging is the vehicle that delivers your products to your customers – it needs to be the best representation of your brand as possible and to create amazing un-boxing experiences.

Custom Packaging Solutions are our forte and our exceptional team will ensure your solution(s) exceed all your expectations. By combining custom boxes and custom envelopes into your packaging solution, your consistent messaging will enhance your audience interaction. Our custom envelope customers include fine paper merchants, independent envelope printers, stationery suppliers, solution providers (such as forms manufacturers and large printers), statement preparation providers, as well as end-users and organizations who use direct mail. Our custom packaging is ideal for pharmaceutical, nutraceutical, food, health & beauty, ecommerce organizations and those who are brand and environmentally conscious.

Global Leaders in Metal Packaging

Sonoco is proud to announce the successful completion of our acquisition of Eviosys. This integration deepens our metal packaging portfolio and expands our global footprint, establishing us as a leader in metal packaging solutions worldwide. Together, we are committed to driving sustainability and delivering high-quality packaging that meets our customers’ evolving needs while continuing to innovate for a better future.

Read the Press Release

Whether it’s as simple as delivering a convenient, nutritious snack after school or as complex as reducing food waste, feeding the hungry and preserving the planet—we have packaging solutions for you.

We’re delighted that Sonoco’s EnviroCan® with paperboard end, part of our EnviroSense™ product range, is helping pladis on their journey to make its packaging easier to recycle and fulfill the requirements of its sustainability agenda. We’re looking forward to helping them with their other ranges in the future.

Philip Brown, UK Sales Manager, Sonoco Consumer Products Europe

About
Bigger than packaging™
The Power of Impact

MAX Solutions was launched to make an impact.   

We impact our customers by investing in next-generation technology to support their growth and manage their complexity to mitigate risk.  We always put forth the best solution regardless of format, material or process.  And we never stop designing ways to elevate their brands in the eyes of the consumer. 

We impact our teammates by creating a great environment to work and empowering them to learn, take on new opportunities and reach new heights. 

We impact the communities in which we operate by supporting local economies through employment opportunities and training programs. We consider these communities home.

We impact the environment by creating the most efficient production flows, innovating ways to simplify the supply chain, designing solutions that are recyclable and minimize waste and investing in technology and materials that reduce our carbon footprint.

To make this impact, we leverage decades of experience designing and manufacturing differentiated, specialty packaging  for the healthcare, consumer and media end-markets.  

Our vision is multi-dimensional because we’re multi-dimensional. 

And, because at the end of the day…it’s bigger than packaging.

How We’re Different

We strive to deliver positive impact every day. 

Over the course of our years operating – and succeeding – in the specialty packaging segment, we’ve learned that without a doubt, the most effective way to create value for your customers, your employees, your communities and the planet is to do the following 3 things.

Build an exceptional team with the best talent; 

Invest in next-generation technology; and,

Never (ever) place limits on creativity.

So that’s what we do. 

Learn more

FIND OUT MORE
	
Hartmann's New Colour Assortment for Europe

FIND OUT MORE
	
Who We Are and What You Get

Founded in 1917 in Denmark, Hartmann is the world’s leading manufacturer of moulded fibre egg packaging, the leading manufacturer of fruit packaging in South America, and a leading manufacturer of machinery for producing moulded fibre packaging. 

You can be sure of maximum product protection, packing runability and in-store saleability. In other words, we create extra value for our customers.

READ MORE
Egg Packaging

You can choose from a wide array of environmentally friendly egg packaging made from moulded fibre in an extensive range of pack sizes, colours and shapes.

READ MORE
Fresh Food Packaging

This new product concept is designed to cut down on the ​plastic used in fresh food packaging by giving producers an environmentally friendly alternative made from moulded fibre.

READ MORE
Egg Marketing

As a Hartmann customer, you can benefit from a huge choice of professional marketing services based on consumer insights, for example, packaging design that includes appealing graphics and messaging that drive sales.

READ MORE
Technology

As a packaging manufacturer, you can benefit from a state-of-the-art moulded fibre technology platform comprising complete production lines, moulds, tooling and spare parts, as well as comprehensive service and technology support.

READ MORE
	
Sustainability
Today’s newspaper. Tomorrow’s egg carton.
 Drawing upon our extensive expertise as a global leader in recyclable and biodegradable moulded fibre packaging made from recovered paper, we are firmly committed to further minimising our climate and environmental footprint. Hartmann’s extensive global network, which includes hundreds of companies, prioritises upholding our environmental, social, and governance responsibilities across the entire value chain. 

Torben Rosenkrantz-Theil, CEO

Label Papers Overview
PACKAGING PAPERS

Our broad range of highly functional coated and uncoated papers are designed for packaging applications that require oil and grease resistance, wet-strength, FDA compliance, printability, strength properties, fiber certification and recycled content. Our portfolio features alternative barrier products and standard and unbleached fiber options.

Packaging Papers Overview
PUBLISHING PAPERS

Our comprehensive freesheet and premium hybrid portfolio of publishing papers are found in a range of basis weights, brightness levels and PPI ranges. If you are looking for a company that can deliver manufacturing flexibility, product innovation and the finest service in the industry, call us. We know what it takes to make your project a success.

Publishing Papers Overview
TECHNICAL PAPERS

Our innovative papers are engineered for highly specialized applications. The lineup delivers functionality, including creping, flame resistance, water repellency and high wet-strength. Our advanced product development and scalable manufacturing capability drive innovation, allowing us to make truly differentiated papers.

Technical Papers Overview

Depuis 1961, notre métier consiste à valoriser les arbres pour fabriquer des matériaux de construction en étant bien enracinés dans la communauté de Chibougamau.

Au fil des ans, la famille de Chantiers Chibougamau s’est agrandie et s’est renouvelée. En 2015, l’usine Scierie Landrienne s’ajoutait à notre quotidien et, en 2020, nous avons relancé l’usine Nordic Kraft de Lebel-sur-Quévillon afin de fournir une pâte kraft essentielle à la fabrication de papiers tissus et d’emballages alimentaires, notamment. En mars 2023, nous avons fait l’acquisition des scieries de Béarn et de La Sarre afin de consolider nos activités existantes et de toujours accroitre l’autonomie et la résilience du groupe.

Notre équipe de Nordic Structures est composée de professionnels qui accompagnent les partenaires de l’industrie de la construction dans l’utilisation de nos produits en bois d’ingénierie, des solives en I et des poutres, colonnes et panneaux en bois massif, de la distribution à la réalisation de projets clés en main.

« Nordic », c’est aussi la marque de tous nos produits. 

Chantiers Chibougamau ce sont donc 1 500 hommes et femmes qui contribuent à la transformation d’environ 2,7 millions de mètres cubes de bois pour la production annuelle de 600 millions de pmp de bois d’œuvre, du bois qui permettrait de construire 40 000 maisons unifamiliales par année, plus de 80 millions de pieds linéaires de solives en I, du bois massif permettant de construire des centaines de mètres carrés de grands projets de construction à bas carbone, quelque 300 000 tonnes de pâte kraft et plus de 30 mégawatts d’énergie renouvelable.

CARRIÈRES – EMPLOIS

Faites partie de la famille et
joignez-vous à nous

CHANTIERS CHIBOUGAMAU – © Tous droits réservés 2025 – Conditions d'utilisation –  Vie privée

Formed in 2018 by packaging industry leaders BWAY, MAUSER Group, National Container Group (NCG) and Industrial Container Services (ICS), we're Mauser Packaging Solutions.

 

With our global network of manufacturing, reconditioning, and recycling facilities, we deliver high-quality, sustainable packaging solutions across the full packaging life cycle - closing the packaging loop.

 

We're Redefining Sustainability and providing solutions that have a positive impact on businesses and the planet.

VIBAC Group is a multinational enterprise and one of the world's leading companies in the Pressure Sensitive Self Adhesive Tapes (PSA) and specialty Packaging Films industry (BOPP).

Tencorr Packaging Inc.

Tencorr Packaging Inc. has continued to supply quality corrugated sheet stock at competitive prices while maintaining its goal of providing exceptional service through strategic partnerships with both its customers and suppliers. Quality and service on our customer’s terms is our motto.

Your One Stop Sheet Shop

Contact us and allow us to help you be all that you can be!

Tencorr Latest News
New Website Launched – Tencorr Packaging Inc.
OUR QUALITY & SERVICE
We maintain a resolute focus on quality assurance at our leading class facilities.
GO GREEN
Our Environmental Responsibility. All of our products are 100% recyclable to the end user.
30 YEARS EXPERIENCE
Our team is committed to providing the highest quality corrugated sheets available.
OUR PRODUCTS
We are leaders of corrugated sheet production, with highly consistent quality levels.
GOING WITH THE FLOW

Tencorr and partners work together along each step of the paper-making process to ensure the final product adheres to our commitment to sustainability, innovation and state-of-the-art technology:

From the Forest:
Greenpac Mill uses 100% recycled fibres to make GreenpacXP, an innovative liner board. Rolls of liner board are shipped from the Greenpac Mill to Tencorr for production.

To the Paper Mill:
A combination of Greenpac liner board and corrugating medium is used to manufacture our corrugated sheets on state-of-the-art equipment.

To Tencorr:
Our mill operators have perfected the craft of creating custom-designed corrugated sheets that are used to manufacture each customer’s made-to-order corrugated packaging.

On to the Box Plant:
The custom corrugated packaging is used to sustainably ship and creatively package or display products in the marketplace.

In The Marketplace:
The market for corrugated packaging is growing due to factors such as an increase in economic activities in developing countries and the growth of e-commerce industry.

Recycling & Sustainability:
Recycled corrugated material from consumer and pre-consumer streams travels back to our partners at Greenpac Mill for harvesting.

OUR PARTNERS

Tencorr Packaging Inc. has been supplying quality corrugated sheet stock to it’s customers for over 30 years.

Transform Your Brand

Netpak

Your trusted packaging partner

WHY CHOOSE NETPAK ?

Are you searching for a reliable partner to elevate your packaging project to the next level? Look no further than Netpak, a leading Quebec-based manufacturer specializing in custom product packaging for a diverse range of industries including food, health, beauty, pharmaceuticals, or custom retail packaging. With Netpak’s expertise and commitment to excellence, you can trust that your packaging needs will be met with precision and professionalism.

At Netpak, we understand the importance of premium custom printed packaging that not only enhance the visual appeal of your products but also align with your brand values and environmental responsibilities. That’s why we offer swift, eco-conscious production processes that adhere to rigorous standards, ensuring that your custom packaging not only looks great but also reflects your dedication to sustainability.

Our team of experienced professionals works closely with clients to deliver tailored solutions that meet their unique requirements and exceed their expectations. Whether you’re launching a new product, running a special promotion, or simply need custom packaging for everyday retail needs, Netpak has the capabilities and expertise to bring your vision to life.

With our state-of-the-art facilities and cutting-edge technology, we ensure that your packaging is produced efficiently and to the highest quality standards. And with our commitment to eco-conscious practices, you can feel confident that your custom packaging is not only visually striking but also environmentally friendly.

Don’t settle for anything less than the best when it comes to your packaging needs. Choose Netpak and experience the difference that expert craftsmanship, swift production, and eco-conscious practices can make for your brand. Elevate your custom packaging project with Netpak today and see the difference for yourself.

 

 

 

Our Expertise in Custom Packaging

Mission

MORE INFORMATIONS ?

Looking to propel your business forward with top-notch packaging solutions? Look no further than our expert team, dedicated to delivering fast, high-end packaging solutions designed to fuel the growth and success of our valued customers.

In today’s competitive market, the right custom packaging can make all the difference in capturing consumer attention and driving sales. That’s why we prioritize speed and quality, ensuring that our customers receive their custom packaging solutions promptly without compromising on excellence.

Our commitment to excellence extends beyond just delivering a custom product packaging. We understand that every aspect of your custom packaging, from design to materials to functionality, plays a crucial role in shaping consumer perceptions and driving business success. That’s why we work closely with our customers to understand their unique needs and develop packaging solutions that not only meet but exceed their expectations.

With our fast turnaround times and high-end production capabilities, you can trust that your custom boxes and packaging will be delivered on time and to the highest standards of quality. Whether you’re launching a new product, refreshing your brand image, or looking custom retail packaging, we have the expertise and resources to help you achieve your goals.

Don’t let packaging be an afterthought. Invest in fast, high-end packaging solutions that will elevate your brand and drive your business forward. Partner with us today and experience the difference that quality custom printed packaging can make for your success.

 

 

 

Vision

MORE INFORMATIONS ?

Position yourself as an indispensable player in both the Quebec and Canadian industries by offering a diverse selection of high-quality, eco-conscious packaging solutions to consumers. With a commitment to sustainability and excellence, your brand can become synonymous with trust, reliability, and environmental stewardship.

In today’s conscientious market, consumers are increasingly prioritizing products and brands that demonstrate a commitment to environmental responsibility. By providing a wide array of eco-friendly packaging options, you can meet the growing demand for sustainable solutions while establishing your brand as a leader in the industry.

From biodegradable materials to recyclable packaging designs, your offerings can cater to the needs of environmentally-conscious consumers across Quebec and Canada. By aligning your brand with eco-friendly practices, you not only contribute to a healthier planet but also attract a loyal customer base that values sustainability.

In addition to environmental considerations, your focus on quality ensures that consumers receive packaging solutions that meet their highest standards. By consistently delivering durable, well-designed packaging options, you can instill confidence in your brand and solidify your position as a trusted provider in the industry.

As you continue to expand your range of offerings and establish yourself as a go-to source for quality, environmentally-friendly packaging, you’ll become an integral part of both the Quebec and Canadian markets. Your commitment to innovation, sustainability, and customer satisfaction will set you apart from competitors and position you for long-term success in the industry.

Papiers et emballages Arteau
Emballage commercial et industriel

Papiers et emballages Arteau se spécialise dans l’emballage commercial et industriel ainsi que dans la conversion des produits du papier et du carton. Nous disposons de tout l’équipement nécessaire afin de répondre aux besoins de notre clientèle en matière de produits d’emballage et d’expédition. Notre garantie de satisfaction repose sur notre service à la clientèle personnalisé et adapté aux demandes de nos clients.

Nous disposons d’une vaste gamme de produits d’emballage qui pourra répondre à l’ensemble de vos besoins!

Les experts de l’emballage

Notre rôle est d’aider nos clients dans la réalisation de leurs objectifs d’affaires en offrant des prix compétitifs et un service de livraison rapide. Papiers et emballages Arteau se démarque de la concurrence en proposant un service client complet. Nos professionnels vous accompagneront dans vos démarches d’achat afin de vous conseiller convenablement et de vous aider à faire un choix éclairé.

Fort d’une expertise de plus de 35 ans!

Conversion de papiers et de cartons
Distribution de produits d’emballage et d’expédition
Machinerie visant l’emballage commercial et industriel
Respect des délais d’expédition

Nous savons que votre temps est précieux. C’est pour cette raison que notre entreprise met tout en œuvre afin de vous offrir des produits d’emballage de qualité supérieure dans le respect des délais prescrits. Papiers et emballages Arteau possède un système d’expédition efficace et performant qui permet à nos clients de toujours recevoir leurs commandes dans les meilleurs délais.

Les meilleurs tarifs de l’industrie

Notre équipe travaille fort afin de trouver les meilleurs prix sans faire de compromis sur la qualité. L’industrie est en mouvement et nous adaptons notre offre de services afin de suivre cette tendance. Offrez-vous des produits d’emballage et d’expédition au meilleur prix qui soit!

Les produits d’emballage qu’il vous faut!

Vous recherchez un produit spécifique pour une application spéciale, notre vaste gamme de produits et notre flexibilité en termes de conversion de papiers et de cartons pourront répondre à tous vos besoins. Consultez notre rubrique pour en apprendre davantage sur notre grand choix de produits d’emballage industriel et commercial. Nos conseillers se feront un plaisir de répondre adéquatement à l’ensemble de vos questions.

Toujours en croissance

Papiers et emballages Arteau compte aujourd’hui plus d’une soixantaine d’employés. L’entreprise et sa division ne cessent de prendre de l’expansion. Nos professionnels ont su s’adapter à la demande grandissante de sa clientèle en suivant de près l’évolution de son industrie. Ainsi, Papiers et Emballages Arteau a su créer, au fil des ans, des relations d’affaires basées sur la confiance avec plusieurs collaborateurs d’expérience. L’entreprise continue de se démarquer grâce à son dynamisme, sa flexibilité et sa fiabilité.

La grande famille Arteau!

Papiers et Emballages Arteau, c’est d’abord une grande famille aux valeurs humaines. Toujours soucieux d’avoir un impact positif sur la collectivité, la responsabilité sociale est au cœur de nos valeurs. Grâce à son programme d’intégration social et culturel, l’entreprise offre fièrement un milieu de travail adapté à plus d’une vingtaine de personnes vivant avec une déficience intellectuelle et/ou ayant un trouble du spectre de l’autisme.

Ne cherchez plus!
Meilleur rapport qualité-prix

Papiers et Emballages Arteau vous propose d’opter pour ce qui se fait de mieux en matière d’emballages et de produits d’expédition. Nous disposons des meilleurs tarifs de l’industrie ainsi que des produits d’emballage commercial et industriel de qualité supérieure. Peu importe vos besoins, nos professionnels trouveront exactement ce que vous cherchez, et ce, au meilleur prix!

Nous offrons le meilleur rapport qualité-prix de l’industrie en recherchant pour vous les emballages et produits d’expédition dont vous avez besoin. De plus, notre équipe préparera votre commande rapidement pour que vous puissiez économisez temps et argent!

Chef de file de l’industrie, notre entreprise offre à ses clients un éventail de produits variés ainsi qu’un service à la clientèle personnalisé. Atteignez tous vos objectifs d’affaires en choisissant une équipe spécialisée qui a à cœur vos projets et vos réalisations.

Confiez-nous votre projet et commandez nos produits d’emballage dès aujourd’hui! L’un de nos représentant qualifié se fera un plaisir de vous accompagnez dans vos démarches d’achat.

N’hésitez à communiquer avec nous par téléphone ou en utilisant notre formulaire en ligne.

COMPOSTABLE + SUSTAINABLE

We take our environmental footprint, and commitment to bring progressive products to market, seriously. That’s why we’re the first to bring a packaging solution to market that combines 100% Compostable Lidding Film with a 100% Compostable Tray. We also source our films, adhesives and substrates from local suppliers to improve timing, reliability and reduce our carbon footprint. Read More

IN-HOUSE PREPRESS DEPARTMENT

Producing a new line of packaging, or even switching suppliers, can be a multi-step process. Having prepress expertise on site eliminates delays and reduces the number of steps required to make sure your packaging and labels look precisely the way you intended. Or even better.

CONTAINER CORPORATION OF CANADA
Packaging Since 1977

Founded in 1977, Container Corporation of Canada is an award winning, world leader in the manufacturing of innovative corrugated and plastic packaging with an emphasis on environmental preservation and responsibility for sustainable packaging. Since its inception, Container Corporation has been guided by a combination of research, expertise, and instinct, born out of years of listening carefully to their customers’ dynamic needs.

Container Corporation’s commitment to building a cleaner, more eco-friendly world is further evident in its uniquely designed 28 acre Nature Sanctuary that is situated in the center of its three building campus, available for the public to enjoy all year round.

HIGH-QUALITY BOTTLES, JARS AND PACKAGING COMPONENTS
OUR BUSINESS IS PACKAGING YOUR BUSINESS

For over 60 years Ampak has been committed to producing high-quality bottles, jars and packaging components for the health and beauty, industrial and automotive, food and beverage as well as pharmaceutical-nutraceutical industries. From start to finish, our objective is simple: maintain a clear understanding of our customers’ requirements throughout the design, production and delivery processes and constantly exceed our customer’s expectations. Our qualified in-house team works with our valued customers to provide an extensive A to Z packaging experience.

PLASTIC MATERIALS PET, HDPE, LDPE, PP, PS, AND PVC

Our capacities include injection molding, extrusion blow molding and reheat blow molding.  Our packaging components range from plastic materials including PET, HDPE, LDPE, PP, PS, and PVC, as well as glass wide mouth and glass narrow neck containers.   In our ongoing effort to offer an A to Z packaging solution, we also offers high-quality screen printing and labeling, shrink sleeving, heat transfer and pressure sensitive sleeving.  Ampak also manufacture and distribute a wide range of closures. We carry over 1000 molds in inventory and use FDA resins.

PERSONALIZED PACKAGING SOLUTION

Not finding what you are looking for on our website? We will work together to create a fully personalized packaging solution that perfectly meets your custom needs. Ampak’s message is clear: no one is turned away and a solution must be found for all packaging challenges...  after all, our business is packaging your business!

Smart Tracking

Our revolutionary Smart Tracking system allows us, and you, to track your order through the entire process – from concept to creation to printing and shipping. At Planet, we give you complete transparency into your order so you have total confidence that we’ll deliver what we say we will.

1. PROTOTYPINGWe can cut and deliver a tangible sample to you quickly.
2. REVIEW / REFINEReview the samples with your team and refine any issues with your designs.
3. PRODUCTIONOur plant runs 24/7, enabling us to get your order out quickly.
4. SOFTWARE INTEGRATED TRACKINGTrack your order through the entire production run, from start to finish.
Execute your projects with confidence, knowing you have the uncompromising support and experience of our team behind you.

At Planet, we deliver a personalized experience like no other. You get a responsive team, dedicated to ensuring your success. We’re available and accessible anytime you need to discuss your order. Our production process integrates technology, a large, state-of- the-art production facility and passionate people dedicated to delivering outstanding products and services.

Planet Paper provides much more than just boxes

With over 50 years in the industry, we have developed a solid reputation for product quality and service second to none. Our team is committed to your success and are always ready and eager to handle any of your packaging needs.

Our 150,000 square foot facility runs 24/7, producing high-quality products for an extensive range of clients in Canada, United States and Mexico. If you need to pack, ship or display, we have a solution for your needs. Contact us to learn more.

VIEW OUR PRODUCTS   
More than just Boxes

From boxes to award-winning, interactive displays, there’s no limit to what we can do. Contact us today and let us tell you how we’re different.

WHY WORK WITH PLANET PAPER BOX?


We put our customers first – your requirements and needs are our first priority.

We manage the every step of the process for you – we handle the process for you so you’re confident it will be done correctly and on time.


We do everything in-house – all of our capabilities are in-house. We never outsource, which gives us control over the quality and speed of every part of our process – from manufacturing to shipping and delivery.


We use technology – our software and systems give us real-time visual insight into your order, so nothing slips through the cracks. Any changes can be done in-house, quickly and easily.

We are responsive – no other company can offer you the same level of responsiveness, production turn-around time or personal attention that we do.

	
COMPLETELY CUSTOMIZABLE

From 20 to 1,000,000 – We have inhouse capabilities to execute virtually any project.

	
CUTTING EDGE DESIGN

From simple packaging boxes to award-winning, attractive end cap displays, we have the capabilities needed to execute.

	
OUTSTANDING SUPPORT

We are always accessible and ready to support your needs.

	
100% TRANSPARENCY

Easily track your order from your phone through our Smart Conveyor and Procurement system.

Edco Canada’s Blog
				
Welcome to Edco Canada

Edco Canada, with over 40 years of experience, is the leading Canadian converter and supplier of military specification packaging. Edco is also a leading distributor of desiccants. We supply customers throughout the U.S., Canada, and worldwide. Our large inventory allows us to ship orders in as few as 3 days, and often on the same day, guaranteeing prompt delivery. Our customer service team, averaging 10+ years of experience, provides fast and courteous service and will recommend just the right product to meet the specifications of your military contracts. With more than 35 one-of-a-kind converting machines, we can manufacture custom-sized barrier bags, tubing, shrouds, and blankets tailored to meet your needs at prices guaranteed to beat the competition. We provide a signed certificate of compliance with each military spec order assuring you that our products meet the latest U.S. military requirements. Edco Supply Corporation also manufacturers and stocks a complete line of commercial packaging products.

FEATURED PRODUCTS
Mil-PRF-22019-D Type 1 heat sealable transparent VCI film and MIL-DTL-22020E Type I VCI bags
MIL-PRF-131K-Class 1 (Film Foil)
MIL-PRF-81705-E-Type 1 (EDS/DMI Opaque Static shielding)
VCI (Volatile Protective Inhibitor Papers) & VPI (Volatile Corrosive Inhibitor Papers)
PPT-T-60 Tapes

WHAT WE DO

Its in our Prepress and CAD departments where your packaging project comes to life!

STRUCTURAL DESIGN

Our structural design team challenge our customers to think about traditional packaging in new ways.

PRE-MEDIA DESIGN

Technical reviews are conducted by each department including our press operators to ensure there are no areas of concern with your design.

GRAPHIC DESIGN

Our graphic designers approach packaging as a dynamic platform for marketing and connecting your product with your buyers.

PRINTING

Our cutting-edge, high-capacity printing presses with UV and conventional printing and coating capabilities, provide remarkably consistent results at top speed with a great deal of flexibility.

DIE CUTTING

Our two die cutting machines are equipped with blanking technology that allows your project to be cut from full sheets to individual cartons at top speed.

FINISHING

In finishing we have 2 very well-equipped folder gluers. Our Bobst Alpina is fitted with an inline quality control camera that inspects every carton through the machine.

LEARN MORE ABOUT WHAT WE DO
BOX OF KINDNESS

Social and environmental responsibility are guiding principles at Ingersoll Paper Box. We strive to be environmentally and socially responsible business partners to our clients, employees, and communities. IPB has a corporate giving program called ‘Box of Kindness’ that supports the community through numerous donations and sponsorships, fostering a sense of community.

We support causes such as school breakfast and lunch programs, sports teams, Sleeping Children Around the World, our local Food Bank, and more. Being environmentally and socially responsible where we live, raise our families, and in our working environment has been critical to IPB’s longevity and success for over 100 years. We are committed to creating programs and setting goals that support environmental and social health.

What can Pinto do for you?

Pinto-Packaging Ltd. was incorporated in 1976 as a manufacturer of corrugated products. Our initial niche was the provision of small quantity run corrugated products. Over the years, we have grown to provide many industries packaging solutions to suit their unique requirements. Our experience has led to our specialty in POP displays, custom automotive packaging, and the ultimate one-stop-shop from design to fulfillment to managing customers inventory and shipping requirements. In 2007, our company added to it's specialties a class 10 000, or ISO 7, clean room, for the assembly and packaging of medical devices, cosmetics, prepackaged foods, pharmaceuticals, and healthcare supplies.

Packaging Engineering & Design

Our design team uses ArtiosCAD: structural design software, for creating packaging and display components with the most accurate specification. We offer a full range of services from custom design to regular brown boxes to full samples, complete with graphics. We work to provide the customer a packaging solution quickly and accurately. Specifications and computer aided design (CAD) drawings of your packaging are available upon request.

APC Filtration is now part of Rensa Filtration. Our Engineered Filtration Products (EFP) group is focused on manufacturing and testing mission-critical, high-efficiency air filtration products to OEM customers around the world. In addition to APC, Rensa’s EFP unit includes Custom Filter and R.P. Fedder. 

	 
APC Filtration Inc. is an ISO 9001:2015 certified manufacturer providing over 40 years experience in critical air filter design, engineering, manufacturing and air filter testing for global OEM’s of industrial, commercial and domestic equipment.
Our Products – Custom Air Filters for OEM’s

Original equipment manufacturers (OEM’s) require optimal filter efficiency at the lowest pressure drop to ensure long filter life and peak product performance. As a leading air filter manufacturer, our experience in testing a wide range of equipment and appliances provides APC the knowledge to design, engineer, manufacture and test filters to accomplish these milestones.

 Cloth Bag Filters
 Commercial Air Filters
 Critical OEM Air Filters
View All Products Case Studies
Our Services – Critical Air Filter Testing

Our ISO 6 Test Lab meets the increasing demand for high purity, critical air filter testing in a climate controlled environment to ensure accurate temperature and humidity controls. Computational fluid dynamics (CFD) allow APC’s engineers to quickly design, model and test filter concepts for fit, function, performance and longevity specific for your equipment requirements. Our ISO Team uses an efficient RFQ program to improve data collection to fast track project timelines.

View All Services
Case Studies
Industries We Serve
Global original equipment manufacturers (OEM's) from diverse industries with different applications benefit from APC’s wealth of assorted accomplishments. As one of the top air filter manufacturers, APC applies the expertise gained from successful Aerospace projects to benefit other industries, including Hospital, Medical, and Laboratory Equipment, ensuring consistent performance across diverse applications. Primary industries served include:

Why APC Filtration?

APC Filtration provides over 40 years experience as a manufacturer in filter design, engineering, and filter testing for global OEM’s. We operate in an ISO 9001:2015 environment within LEAN and 5S systems providing our OEM clients the assurances required to meet their demands, expectations, and air quality standards.

SHIPMASTER CONTAINERS LIMITED IS A FULL SERVICE MANUFACTURER OF CORRUGATED PAPER PRODUCTS AND SUPPLIER OF RELATED PACKAGING TO THE GREATER TORONTO AREA AND SOUTHERN ONTARIO

We offer a complete range of sustainable packaging solutions including standard corrugated boxes, corrugated shippers, moving and storage cartons, interior protection, custom die-cut designs, innovative point of purchase displays and sales driving retail packaging. For over fifty-five years our reputation has been built on fresh thinking, innovative, efficient designs, quality manufacturing, quick turnaround and unrivaled customer satisfaction. The versatility of corrugated paper allows each package to be specifically engineered to maximize performance and merchandising throughout its supply chain, while minimizing its carbon footprint. Paper is made from a renewable resource and virtually all Canadians can recycle it.

Why Choose Shipmaster Containers as a Packaging Manufacturer?

Shipmaster Containers understands how important packaging is in protecting your products and boosting your brand image. As premier Canadian packaging suppliers, we are proud of our unwavering commitment to quality, innovation, and client satisfaction.

Personalized Vision

We are committed to realizing your vision. Our professional designers work with customers to understand their brand ethos, target demographic, and specific objectives. Our custom packaging options are made to accurately represent your brand identity and make an unforgettable impact on customers, whether you’re looking for bold colours, elaborate graphics, or specialty finishes.

Unmatched Quality

Quality is the foundation of our unique packaging boxes. We use innovative techniques and premium supplies to ensure the longevity and protection of your items. From corrugated to eco-friendly choices, we provide a variety of materials to help you achieve your sustainability goals without sacrificing quality.

Creative Designs

We provide a wide choice of designs that complement your product line, from elegant and minimalist to vibrant and eye-catching. Your custom packaging will not only meet but surpass consumer expectations thanks to our focus on staying ahead of industry trends.


Choose unique packaging from corrugated shippers that surpass traditional limitations, helping your brand stand out in a competitive market. Improve your packaging experience with Shipmaster Containers, where each box conveys a unique story.

Frequently Asked Questions
Is corrugated the best material for boxes?

Yes! Corrugated cardboard is lighter and less expensive than alternative materials such as plastic, wood, and metal—plus, it is 100% recyclable. Unlike other types of boxes, corrugated boxes fold flat for storage and shipping, saving you money and floor space.

Can you custom design and manufacture corrugated boxes?

Yes, we offer complete custom design and manufacturing services for corrugated packaging tailored to your product’s exact needs.

What is the typical lead time for ordering corrugated shippers?

Lead times can vary, but we typically require 5-10 business days for standard stock box orders and 2-3 weeks for custom-manufactured boxes.

Do you offer recyclable and environmentally friendly packaging options?

Absolutely. We have many sustainable packaging solutions, including recyclable corrugated and corrugated from recycled content.

What industries do your corrugated packaging solutions serve?

Our corrugated shippers are ideal for countless industries, including food/beverage, retail, manufacturing, automotive, pharmaceuticals, and e-commerce.

Can you handle large-volume orders and provide shipping across Canada?

Yes, we have extensive manufacturing capabilities to handle orders of any size and supply chain solutions to ship corrugated boxes nationwide across Canada.

How do you ensure product protection during shipping with corrugated packaging?

Through customized box design, robust construction, and extensive distribution testing, we engineer corrugated solutions to safely distribute your products.

What separates your corrugated shippers from other packaging suppliers?

Our dedicated focus on sustainable innovation, design expertise, nationwide capabilities, and commitment to premium customer service set us apart.

Our expertise
Design and Innovation

We develop creative and unique products tailored to your needs, exploring new materials and innovative solutions that combine design and function, making your brand stand out.

Data integration

Thanks to our expertise in data management, we ensure that the solutions we provide for your brand are seamlessly connected and that your output data is accurate, up-to-date, and easily accessible.

Traceability Solutions

Our traceability solutions help you gather clear information, back up green claims with data, make responsible sourcing decisions, prepare for the Digital Product Passport initiative, and run circular business initiatives.

ESG

Our Environmental, Social, and Governance (ESG) focus is to minimize our carbon footprint, incorporate sustainability and promote diversity and inclusion for our employees’ safety and well-being.

Trims — Get inspired and learn more about hangtags, printed and woven labels, badges and patches, and everything you need to know about beautiful designs and innovative and sustainable materials for impactful trims. Discover more about our trims solutions.

Packaging — Whether it is product packaging or e-commerce solutions, we have various options for your packaging needs. We strive to deliver sustainable packaging solutions to match your brand identity and your need for sustainable packaging. Learn more about our packaging solutions.

‍

Care labels — Our dedicated team of experts can provide your brand with hassle-free, fast, and compliant care label solutions. With access to accurate translations and symbol conversions, we ensure your care label setup is optimized and relevant for the markets you serve. Read more about our care label solutions.

Source tagging solutions — Source tagging of variable data covers a broad range of products and solutions. Whether you need support with your care labels, barcode tags, price tags, or shoebox labels, we can quickly and accurately integrate your product data and optimize our solutions to your variable data needs. Learn more about our source tagging solutions.

ProductDNA® — Monitor your social and environmental compliance across the supply chain and gain insights into your key sustainability goals. Get real-time data and reporting and learn more about on-product communication with the help of QR code solutions. Meet the solution for your brand's traceability needs - our digital platform, ProductDNA®.

‍

RFID — Improve your stock accuracy and increase productivity with RFID. We provide support in choosing the best setup for your brand and cover the entire production of your RFID tags and labels. Learn more about our RFID solutions.

Store Decorations — Everything you need for your brick-and-mortar store decorations. Our team can create store deco solutions tailored to your brand identity and needs, from logo display, window decorations, signage, and product display options. Read more about our store decoration solutions.

About US

Atlantic Star Bingo based in Newfoundland & Labrador and is the province’s largest supplier of charitable gaming products. With over 24 years in business, we have an unmatched level of expertise & experience to help meet any fundraising need.

Our wide range of products and services cover virtually any fundraising need, including; bingo paper, pull tab tickets, bingo dabbers, bingo machines, all forms of tickets (spins, 50/50, beer, admit one, etc.) and we are the only producer of custom media bingo cards in Canada.

We strive to build strong, long-lasting relationships with our customers and many have been with us for over 20 years. All our customers receive professional, industry leading support to ensure their fundraising initiatives run smoothly but also to raise as much as possible for their worthwhile cause.

Innovation and excellence for over 50 years
STRUCTURAL DESIGN

Our structural designers focus first on understanding the unique qualities of your product. Then they produce innovative structural concepts that help communicate value to the customers you are trying to reach.

PREPRESS & PRINTING

Our prepress and proofing processes ensure seamless integration of your artwork, followed by multiple levels of review and confirmation. So your product’s folding carton package will be exactly as you intended it.

SHEETING

Our versatile and high-speed paperboard sheeting equipment enables us to quickly produce high quantities of precise sheet sizes for specific production runs, optimizing efficiency and minimizing waste.

DIE-CUTTING

Our die-cutting department features a variety of die-cutting presses including automatic platen, hand-fed platen and cylinder presses that allow us the flexibility to select the right press for the job.

FINISHING

Our finishing department represents a versatile mix of gluers, formers and windowing equipment, affording us a full range of capabilities, accuracy, flexibility, and a seamless flow through the manufacturing process for every paperboard packaging project.

Créateur et Leader Mondial de la solution packaging Sleeve retractable

Expert de la fabrication d'étiquettes tubulaire, Sleever s'inscrit en tant que spécialiste de l'emballage depuis plus de 45 ans dans une démarche d'innovation.

 

Leader du concept sleeve et détenteur de la marque SLEEVER®, qui lui a permis de faire du Sleeve – étiquette plastique thermo-rétractable– une technologie majeure du packaging.

 

Sleever est une entreprise verticalement intégrée, qui maîtrise toutes les étapes du process : de la formulation des films à leur transformation et impression, à la conception de machines, en passant par les services de conditionnement et de parachèvement à façon.

 

L’Expert en habillage d’emballages et en machines d’étiquetage

La technologie du sleeve apporte des fonctionnalités aux produits des marques : décoration, personnalisation, inviolabilité, protection, promotion des ventes et traçabilité.

 

Une solution d'emballage qui convainc les marques les plus exigeantes de la pharmacie, la parfumerie, la cosmétique, l'alimentaire et les produits d'entretien.

 

Grâce à une démarche d’amélioration continue , la Recherche et Développement SLEEVER innove en permanence en matière de procédés industriels, et de produits : nouvelles fonctionnalités, nouveaux aspects, impact environnemental..

 

Sleever excelle dans la production d'étiquettes produits et la conception de Machines de conditionnement sleeve, permettant de vous fournir un service différencié à forte valeur ajoutée.

 

Une offre Système d'emballage sur mesure

Notre analyse fine de chaque problématique client dans ses besoins marketing, technique et économique prend forme grâce à la maîtrise totale de la technologie du sleeve, permettant de créer la solution d’emballage idéale pour chaque produit.

 

Elle peut être mise en œuvre sur une de nos Machines d'étiquetage sleeve flexible et adaptée, et intégrée à une ligne d'emballage .

 

Ce sont autant de facettes de l'expertise technologique que nous mettons au service des marques, en prenant part à la réussite des Projets de nos Clients.

Fabricant de feuilles de carton ondulé au Québec

Les Emballages Montcorr, leader dans le domaine du carton ondulé, occupe une position privilégiée dans l’industrie. Grâce à notre flexibilité et à notre rigueur en matière de service clients, nous sommes en mesure de fournir des feuilles de carton ondulé de haute qualité répondant aux besoins spécifiques de nos clients au Québec, en Ontario, dans les Maritimes et aux États-Unis.

INVESTIR ET INNOVER

L’innovation au cœur de nos investissements

Les Emballages Montcorr innove constamment. Nos investissements dans de nouveaux équipements hautement performants et à la fine pointe de la technologie en font foi. Dans cette optique, nous avons fait l’acquisition d’une nouvelle onduleuse Fosber 400 L. En tant que seul fabricant dédié à la production de feuilles de carton ondulé au Québec, ces investissements nous permettent d’offrir une gamme variée de feuilles de carton, en plus de contribuer à la pérennité de l’industrie. 

Nouvelle onduleuse Fosber

NOTRE PRIORITÉ

Gestion de la qualité

La qualité est indéniablement une valeur essentielle pour Les Emballages Montcorr. C’est ce qui nous distingue de la concurrence. Nos normes sont extrêmement élevées et se manifestent à travers nos produits, nos délais de livraison et notre service à la clientèle. Notre engagement envers cette valeur se démontre de diverses manières, dont les suivantes:

NOTRE CERTIFICATION ISO 9001
NORMES TAPPI
NOTRE LABORATOIRE

Les Emballages Montcorr a mis en place un système de gestion de la qualité des plus performant.

Grâce à ce système, nous sommes en mesure de fixer des objectifs de production précis, mesurables et évolutifs. Chez Les Emballages Montcorr, la qualité est au cœur de notre production.

Feuilles de carton ondulé personnalisées

Nous sommes également experts dans la fabrication de feuilles de carton à partir de rouleaux de spécialité. Nous avons la flexibilité à développer des produits sur mesure pour tous nos clients. Ceci nous permet d’offrir des produits qui répondent à vos besoins.

En savoir plus
Feuilles de carton ondulé régulières

Les Emballages Montcorr proposent une gamme variée de produits réguliers, disponibles dans une multitude de flûtes et de formats. Que vous recherchiez des quantités importantes ou plus restreintes, nous vous conseillerons afin de choisir le carton ondulé selon vos exigences.

En savoir plus

ENGAGEMENT CLIENT

Notre engagement envers nos clients

Notre production de carton ondulé est guidée par des engagements auxquels nous adhérons quotidiennement:

offrir une expertise hors pair

viser une efficacité par un souci constant de l’amélioration continue

s’appuyer sur une équipe chevronnée dédié à satisfaire nos clients

assurer un développement durable

C’est ainsi que nous avons su développer une relation de confiance avec nos clients, qu’ils soient nouveaux ou de longue date.

PARTENAIRE DE CONFIANCE

Une équipe dynamique à l’écoute de vos besoins

L’équipe dynamique chez Les Emballages Montcorr est engagée à donner une valeur accrue aux clients. Nous sommes passionnés et centrés sur l’humain; notre force réside dans notre versatilité et notre professionnalisme. C’est pourquoi nous nous adaptons rapidement aux besoins de votre entreprise.

Notre objectif est d’établir des relations à long terme avec nos clients et d’être un partenaire de confiance, quels que soient les défis à relever.

Développement durable

Nous sommes fiers détenteurs de la certification FSC®.

Celle-ci souligne notre engagement à l’égard des pratiques durables dans nos processus de fabrication du carton ondulé.

QUICK BIO OF
ÉMILE SÉNÉCHAL

The career of Émile Sénéchal, founder of Émile Sénéchal et Fils, is impressive. His innate sense of entrepreneurship characterizes his long career in the business. In 1911, when he was 19 years old, he began his entrepreneurial life. From drilling water wells to making potato bags, Émile always explored the various opportunities available to him. Among other things, he owned a general store, a flour mill, lumber camps and a sawmill. This talented businessman bequeaths to his descendants a remarkable history and heritage.

MEAT & DAIRY CASE LINERS

POULTRY, MEAT & FISH PADS

These white pads prevent leakage in retail portion packages and absorb juices without drying food. Freshness and appeal are maintained longer. Reduce rewrapping and product downgrades. Maintain display case cleanliness.

COHESIVE KRAFT PACKAGING PAPER

Labor-saving Cohesive Kraft Packaging Paper sticks to itself, not your product, forming a strong seal without tape, glue, or staples. It protects fragile surfaces (furniture, auto parts, etc.). Two sheets of liner board make a secure instant envelope.

The Safe Quality Food (SQF) Program is a rigorous and credible HACCP-based food safety and quality certification that is recognized by retailers, brand owners, and food service providers world-wide. Recognized by the Global Food Safety Initiative (GFSI), the SQF family of food safety and quality codes are designed to meet industry, customer, and regulatory requirements for all sectors of the food supply chain – from the farm all the way to the retail stores.

This rigorous farm-to-fork food safety and quality certification also helps food producers assure their buyers that their food products meet the highest possible global food safety standards.

FELIX COMPOUNDS – RESEARCH TO INNOVATION

Founded in 1999, Felix Compounds is a certified ISO 9001 company specialized in manufacturing compounds such as thermoplastic rubber (TPR/TR) based on SBS (Kraton D type), thermoplastic elastomer (TPE) based on SEBS, SEEPS (Kraton G type), thermoplastic olefin (TPO), mineral-filled thermoplastics (talc, calcium carbonate [CaCO3]) and thermoplastics reinforced with glass fibre or mica, or special compounds with graphite, barium sulfate and more.
Felix Compounds also offers subcontracting compound services.

Regardless of the quantity, we provide you with tailored and effective service and technical support.

Our thermoplastic elastomers can be coextruded or overmolded on polypropylene (PP), polyethylene (PE), ABS, polystyrene (PS), nylon, and TPU.
Several trademarked products can be replaced by our TPE, TPR (TR) or TPO elastomers, such as VistaFlex, Santoprene, Vyram, Synprene, OnFlex-S, Versaflex, Dynaflex, Garaflex, Ultralex, Tekbond, Sarlink, Telcar, Monprene, Thermolast, TufPrene, etc.

TPEs can be an interesting alternative to replace vulcanized thermoplastic TPV and polyvinyl chloride PVC. On various levels, TPE has proven to be far superior to TPV and PVC.

Our TPR (TR), TPE, TPO elastomers can be easily coloured, do not involve drying, and their use does not require any special equipment or mounting.

Felix Compounds is a leader in the synthetic turf industry, for which we produce ultra-high performance infill pellets that provide durability, UV resistance, comfort and optimal shape.

Felix Compounds is committed to sustainable development. This certification ensures appropriate monitoring and controlling of human resources, involvement within the community, and the environmental aspect. The life cycle analysis (LCA) of the products is available to customers concerned about their ecological footprint.

CARTON DEPUIS PLUS DE 25 ANS
Emballage LM fait sa marque dans le domaine de l’emballage comme fournisseur de carton partout au Canada, et ce, depuis plus de 25 ans. Se distinguant par son innovation et son désir de repousser les limites en conception et comme fournisseur d’emballages de toutes sortes, notre équipe aide les entreprises à mieux présenter, protéger, emballer et expédier leur marchandise.
NOTRE NOUVEAU PRODUIT PHARE
Boîte isotherme
Impressionnez vos clients grâce à notre boîte isotherme destinée spécifiquement aux produits alimentaires. Sa conception unique lui permet de résister aux variations de température et conserve vos denrées alimentaires en parfaite condition. De plus, notre boîte isotherme est entièrement recyclable, ce qui en fait un produit unique sur le marché !
En savoir plus
TOUS LES PRODUITS D’EMBALLAGE À VOTRE PORTÉE
Nous savons trop bien que chaque produit est unique et que, par conséquent, les défis d’emballage de chaque fournisseur le sont aussi. C’est pourquoi au fil des ans nous avons tout mis en œuvre pour développer une vaste ligne de solutions d’emballage carton robustes, légères et écologiques. Avec une offre aussi diversifiée et adaptable à tous les besoins, nous nous sommes rapidement taillé une place comme fournisseur incontournable d’emballages en tous genres.

NOS SERVICES EN TANT QUE FOURNISSEUR D’EMBALLAGES CARTON
Étant une entreprise flexible et innovante, le fournisseur Emballages LM divise ses principaux services en deux offres : la conception de l’emballage grâce à une expertise pointue en recherche et développement ainsi que la fabrication de produits de protection personnalisés. Voyez comment notre équipe peut vous aider à optimiser vos processus d’emballage, en tant que fournisseur pour d’autres entreprises, en vente e-commerce, en transport inter-usine ou en expédition directe au consommateur. Peu importe votre défi d’emballage, nous avons une solution sur mesure.

DEMANDE D’EMPLOI
Vous désirez faire partie d’une équipe gagnante ? Voici où vous devez postuler !

Emballages LM est une entreprise jeune et dynamique qui est constamment à la recherche de nouveaux talents ! Basée à Saint-François-de-la-Rivière-du-Sud, l’entreprise y opère ses deux usines ainsi que son siège social. Les usines offrent une atmosphère de travail propre et ce, dans une ambiance motivante ! De nombreux avantages sociaux sont offerts dont des assurances. Faites les premières démarches en remplissant un formulaire d’emploi et contactez-nous pour plus d’information.

Widely respected converter and manufacturer of paper products.

North American Paper Products is a Canadian owned converter and manufacturer of paper products for over 45 years, specializing in the conversion of a wide assortment of paper grades for sale to a wide variety of customers from North to South America.

Serving the paper industry for over 45 years

It has and always will be our goal here at North American Paper Products to maintain and grow within our community. For over 45 years, we have set the industry standards of superior product quality and customer service by continually seeking new and efficient ways to meet the needs of our customers. By placing product quality, customer satisfaction above all else we are assured to meet the needs of generations to come.

Who We Are
Zero waste packaging shows a significant cost savings compared to disposable.


Over 18 years ago CkdPack was born out of a simple belief that packaging did not have to be expendable. We are not satisfied until you are satisfied, and we will go to great lengths to ensure the protection of your goods.
 
Our focus is to guarantee that your product is packed to perfection-whether it be in a container, rack, or bin-using our reusable systems.
 
Our engineers know how to secure your cargo for shipping or storage. Ckdpack, always at your service 100% of the time.
 
Our unique approach to packaging starts at the very beginning. By involving our Team in the early development of your project, we can help integrate logistical considerations into your timeline and budget.
 
We can show you how different options in packaging can impact the success of your program. By getting a grasp on these issues from the beginning, we will save you time and money.
Why Choose Us
Zero waste

"Zero waste" pledge is the foundation of the Ckdpack brand.

Reducing Costs

We are focused on reducing costs for the clients while helping the environment.

End to end logistical solutions

We also offer complete end to end logistical solutions further reducing the costs.

OUR VISION

Our vision is to provide smart, high-quality, and cost-effective Packaging to our customers. Through our vision we would like to create an opportunity for a lasting business relationship with you. Our primary objective is to offer you, our valued customer, a cost-effective ultimate solution for all your Packaging requirements and strengthen the trust and confidence you place in us.

OUR VALUES

We strongly believe that relationships are the key to success. Our dedicated Team will build that relationship through quality service that will continue to add value to your business year over year.  Our business philosophy is to serve our customers with integrity, reliability and dignity and treat them as just not customers, but as business partners, offering them win-win solutions.

OUR TEAM

Ckdpack is a team of highly experienced packaging professionals with over a century of collective experience. We are determined to pursue relentless commitment to quality service. We are fully trained in handling all your inquiries in a professional manner so that we can offer you one stop solutions for all your packaging needs.

About Master Manufacturing

Master Manufacturing Inc, an ISO9001 registered company, and CAMSC certified minority owned business enterprise, offers over 30 years of custom steel fabrication, cut and sew experience with specialization in returnable steel racks, carts and bins for automotive use, and vinyl dunnage bags for painted, grained and molded in color automotive parts. It has widened its product line by offering similar services to aircraft, heavy machinery manufacturing, leisure, commercial and residential building, hospitality, mining, railways, defense, government organizations and energy industries. Being a custom shop, it can weld steel frames or sew heavy duty fabrics as per need.

PIONNIERS DE L’INDUSTRIE
IMPRIMERIE D’ÉTIQUETTES AUTOCOLLANTES
SPÉCIALISTE FLEXOGRAPHIQUE
DEPUIS PLUS DE 50 ANS



Fondée en 1961, Étiquette Commerce Inc. s'est taillée une place de choix dans le domaine de l'impression d'étiquettes et de matériel de promotion au Canada. Toujours à l'affut de l'innovation et de la qualité, le coeur même de notre succès depuis plus de 50 ans.

Notre renommée repose sur une équipe de collaborateurs compétents et professionnels qui possèdent une riche expérience dans les divers secteurs d'activités de l'imprimerie et de la gestion.

La fidélité de nos clients témoigne de l'importance que nous portons à leurs besoins et à leurs exigences. Toujours à l'écoute de nouvelles idées, la satisfaction de nos clients est une valeur essentielle chez Étiquette Commerce.

CE QUI FAIT NOTRE RENOMMÉE

Notre mission est d'approfondir notre compréhension des besoins de notre clientèle, rechercher une amélioration constante de notre service par les investissements en technologie et l'utilisation des solutions prônants l'environnement à toutes les étapes de la production.

Nous nous démarquons par notre professionnalisme, nos innovations, notre rapidité d'exécution, ainsi que notre intégrité et notre ténacité; le service à la clientèle nous dicte la voie à suivre et notre équipe nous permet d'atteindre cet objectif.

© 2020 Étiquette Commerce inc. Tous droits réservés.

Providing food packaging across North America.
PEI Bag Co. is a Canadian supplier of bags, equipment, and supplies for food production facilities.
;
We service agriculture, aquaculture, and dry goods customers, supplying potato bags, produce bags, and dry goods bags, specifically leno mesh, multi-wall paper, FIBC, poly, flour and sugar bags. Our closing material options include Kwik Loks, threads and staples.
Our food packaging bags are available in a variety of styles, formats and size ranges, and for a number of applications including potatoes, carrots, turnips, sugar, flour, mussels and lobster.

As a full-service packaging company, we partner with industry leaders to ensure your food packaging requirements are met from the initial concept, artwork, printing plates, through to final manufacturing.

Our sales team is ready to serve your food packaging needs. Contact us today for information and pricing.

Cut from a
Different Cloth.

ICP is North America’s premier cut and sew contractor. We help make fascinating products in support of aerospace, military, medical, logistical, and custom markets.

FIND THE SOLUTION
THAT IS RIGHT FOR
YOUR ORGANIZATION

Whether you need support with small scale prototyping or require high-volume production, ICP’s passionate, expert team of engineers and production staff are eager to assist. We utilize cutting edge equipment to achieve cost-effective, high quality delivery. If only everything was this easy.

Which of our world-class divisions would serve your best? Don’t know? Then why not CONTACT US?

AEROSPACE & DEFENCE

Returning rocket components to earth and protecting our troops are not simple tasks. ICP’s Aerospace & Defence division has the experience to support your critical production. Mission Accomplished.

MEDICAL

Protecting our frontline healthcare heroes is essential. Learn how ICP has partnered with leading health organizations to modernize the manufacture of critical personal protective equipment.

LOGISTICS

You make fascinating products, but do you protect them in transit? Learn about how ICP’s history of supporting automotive, shipping, banking, and insurance markets with our various logistical solutions.

CUSTOM ENGINEERING

Have a great idea you need to prototype? Need help with your custom solution to a captivating problem? We love new and unique ideas, so let us help you bring it to market!

TOP GROWING COMPANY OF 2021

ICP is pleased to announce it placed No. 257 on the 2021 Report on Business ranking of Canada’s Top Growing Companies!

Canada’s Top Growing Companies ranks Canadian companies on three-year revenue growth. ICP earned its spot with three-year growth of 143%.

ICP made the decision to pivot into manufacturing PPE in order to overcome the shortages faced by the entire country. In doing so, we saw major growth in manufacturing capabilities and subsequently revenues. Placing amongst the top companies in Canada is a well deserved reflection of the hard work, time and resources put in by every member of ICP.

THESE PEOPLE LIKE US

Our relationship with ICP spans many years. Their wealth of experience, dedication to quality, and a focus on service are all invaluable to Scepter. We are a better supplier to our customers when we partner with dedicated vendors like ICP.

Ryan Windeler, Senior Buyer / Expeditor, Scepter

WHAT'S GOING ON
A Business Boom Inspires Investment in Automation

“We’ve doubled in size – twice, two years in a row” – Marc Langlois, President of ICP.

ICP is pleased to announce that for a second time, we have been featured in a Manufacturing In Focus article. Automation is the way forward. So we share our plans on how we’re going to tackle this next challenge.

D'APPROVISIONNEMENT
EN CONVERGENCE
	
 
Plus qu’un simple fournisseur de produits d’emballage, MS offre une stratégie personnalisée d’approvisionnement complète depuis plus de 15 ans.

MS a le souci de se différencier de la compétition en fournissant à son partenaire d’affaires les outils et le soutien nécessaire pour satisfaire ses besoins d’emballage, d’entreposage, de transport et d’étiquettes.

L’avantage de choisir MS réside dans la centralisation, la coordination et la rapidité de nos services procurant au client une stratégie optimale se traduisant en économie d’argent, de temps et d’espace en plus de minimiser les erreurs dues à une logistique complexe entre plusieurs intervenants.

	

De plus, l’entreposage et la gestion de votre distribution vous permettront de maximiser la capacité de production de votre usine, de mettre un inventaire de protection en place et d’ainsi économiser sur des matières premières en augmentant votre volume d’achat.

Nous mettons aussi à votre disposition un système de gestion d’inventaire qui suit vos consommations. Notre site Web, facile d’utilisation, vous permet d’ajuster les quantités minimums et maximums en fonction de votre carnet de commandes.

Et c’est avec plus de 100 000 pi² et une flotte de camions équipés que nous offrons une stratégie d’approvisionnement fiable et une gestion pro-active de vos inventaires. Que ce soit pour de petites ou pour de grandes quantités, nous assurons un service constant et professionnel et restons à l’écoute de nos clients en tout temps.
