Explore Our Products

We are a custom laminator of pre-finished panels, helping design and construction leaders across the country create more affordable housing for Canadians. Combining our top-quality material with unparalleled customer service and decades of experience, we make it easier to build faster and efficient projects with modular materials. From product selection to installation, we’re there every step of the way.

THE VIPCO DIFFERENCE
PRODUCT

As specialists in manufacturing design-focused, pre-finished housing products, we have a broad selection of product style, color, finish and design. We can even customize production to create the right fit for your project.

LOGISTICS

Utilizing our reliable inventory, flexible production capacity, and trusted logistics partners, we’ll take care of getting you the right product, at the right time, for the right price – which means less work for you getting the order to the job site.

DELIVERY

Using our own Regional Pool Trucks for delivery, we can deliver your product on time helping keep your building project on track.

SUPPORT

We care about the work we do and the partners we work with. In our 50+ years of business, our focus has always been on making sure we are helping find the right solutions for every housing project we are a part of.


Our Vipco Bold Guarantee: We guarantee our products for the lifetime of yours.

À propos de nous

Les Industries Sanfaçon Inc. ont à coeur la satisfaction de leurs clients. Manufacturier de produits de papier et de plastique pour la restauration depuis plus de 50 ans.

Étant complètement intégré, nous produisons la gamme la plus large de l'industrie et nous livrons partout en Amérique du Nord de notre usine de Québec.

Ayant un parc d'équipement moderne, performant et flexible, nous pouvons personnaliser nos produits peu importe le besoin.

La grande compétence de nos employés est un atout majeur pour notre entreprise et nous permet de rencontrer les requêtes les plus exigeantes de notre clientèle.

Notre ligne de produits comprend : serviettes humides, napperons de papier, coutellerie de plastique, filtres à café, papiers cirés, serviettes de table et sacs de papier.

Nous avons une gamme de produits très développée et nous nous spécialisons dans l'impression d'étiquettes privées. N'hésitez pas à nous contacter pour tous vos besoins et projets.

Greetings and welcome to Polyson!

We have been a family-run business for 32 years and counting, and have built a long-standing relationship for consistently high quality products, accommodating delivery times, friendly and personable service as well as competitive pricing.

A great testament to our ability to excel in the aforementioned areas is the fact that we have not had a website until our 27th year of business, and have relied solely on word of mouth from our loyal customers, some of whom have urged us to acquire a website! Please have a look around the website to see what products and services that we offer you, as well as what makes our company so unique.

Did you know?

The majority of polyethylene produced in North America is a by-product of natural gas – polyethylene is in fact derived from a waste product of the natural gas (used to heat our homes, etc.). The advent of a plastic has enabled this waste product to be redirected into a usable (and reusable) product instead of being burned (released) into the environment. In fact, most shopping bags (for example) are reused multiple times. Interestingly, plastic bags create only one third of the CO2 emissions than their paper counterparts, per-use. Further, according to a study commissioned by the U.K. Environment Agency in 2007, on a per-use basis, polyethylene shopping bags produce fewer carbon emissions than permanent, cloth bags, and were found to be only 0.5% as destructive to the climate as cloth bags on an average per-use basis.

About Albany Packaging



Albany Packaging is a friendly, experienced and professional folding carton solutions supplier that works with its clients to create the best solutions for their packaging needs. Since 1947, Albany Packaging has been helping its clients determine their needs and execute them – on time and budget. From custom displays to stock designs, we can meet any need in a timely, personal and professional manner.

Variety of Custom Packaging

With decades of experience, we work with our customers to design and build custom boxes like Bakery boxes, Cupcake boxes, Donut boxes and food packaging items like Food trays and other packagings supplies that suits their needs.

Friendly & Quick Support

Our customer support and sales teams provide helpful and efficient service to ensure that our customers receive what they need, when they need it.

Environmentally Friendly

We ensure that our impact to the environment is minimal by recycling, reusing, and reducing. We also purchase solely from vendors that have the same green values as us.

PRODUCTS + SERVICES
What We Offer
Design

Our team has 100+ years of product knowledge and design experience in the packaging industry. That experience and expertise is key to ensuring we can provide our customers with unparalleled service and solutions to meet their needs. Regardless of the project or complexity, let us put our know-how to work for you!

Manufacture

Post Packaging operates in our 60,000 Sq. ft manufacturing facility located just outside Windsor, Ontario. We are equipped to manufacture products & designs of various sizes, shapes or level of complexity. We offer our customers a wide range of materials and solutions which can be customized to their needs. Our attention to detail and focus on producing the highest quality is a part of our culture.

Deliver

 We provide our customers with products exactly when and where they need them. We understand that our customers use their space for production which is why Post Packaging offers JIT (Just in Time) delivery services. Having our own fleet of trucks and experienced drivers on staff allows control and flexibility delivery scheduling and allows us to get items turned around quickly for our customers.

Services

We take pride in adding value to our customers in all the services we provide. We offer full service in-house product design, prototype and sample shop, short run production, Vendor Managed Inventory (VMI) services, Warehousing/Stock and Release services, Drop ‘N’ Hook delivery services & more.

Our Vision

To innovate and grow in the packaging industry by providing creative and sustainable solutions that benefit our customers, employees, the community where we operate and the environment.

Product Label Printing in Toronto
Custom Product Label Printing in Toronto, Canada

ProScan Media Products employs highly skilled label engineers that can help you create and print high-quality custom barcode labels, printed sticker labels, and packaging solutions for your company. We have a dedicated staff that will work to ensure that your brand and/or product gets the visibility it deserves.

No matter which industry you’re from — food, automotive, manufacturing, or distribution and logistics — we provide customized packaging solutions that will fit whatever your organization needs.

Choose ProScan Media

ProScan Media is a product label maker that manufactures label products in Canada and ships throughout North America.

 

Our facility uses eco-friendly manufacturing and printing technologies and techniques that minimize our company’s overall impact on the environment.

 

We provide free physical test samples to make sure that you are satisfied with our products. Our prices are competitive, allowing you to save on costs.

We Are Your Go-to Provider of Label Printing Near You

Printing labels is what we do. Whether you’re in need of thermal direct labels, barcode labels, shipping labels, digital labels, or laser labels, we have just what you’re looking for.

 

Give us a call toll-free 1-877-488-3043 for inquiries.

FAQ

What label shapes can you create?

The labelling equipment we use is extremely flexible. No matter the shape you need, we can print it. We have had the pleasure of working with various customers with unusual shape requirements and have an excellent track record of delivering exactly what they wanted.

 

What colours can you print?

We provide high-quality full-colour printing, no matter the colour you need. Our digital press allows us to give you the exact hue and tone that you require. We make sure to get the colour right every time.

 

What is the best material for sticker labels or barcode printer labels?

There is no one-size-fits-all solution. The best material is one that is suited to the application. Shipping labels require a different material from barcode labels. Our Canada-based company will make sure to choose the best label for your design and application requirements.

 

What materials/items can your labels adhere to?
We have a variety of adhesives including permanent, removable, freezer-grade, and super-permanent. We match the adhesive to the product.

 

Do you provide free samples?

Absolutely! Call us at 1-877-488-3043 to make a request.

OBTENIR UNE SOUMISSION
GAMME DE NOS BOÎTES ET PRODUITS D’EMBALLAGE DE CARTON SUR MESURE

Laklé œuvre dans la conception et fabrication de solutions d’emballage carton sur mesure, en petites et moyennes quantités. Nous n’avons donc pas de catalogue de produits, puisque tous nos projets sont différents et conçus pour les besoins spécifiques de chaque client. 

Toutefois, depuis la dernière décennie, Laklé se spécialise dans la fabrication de produits en carton ondulé pour répondre aux besoins croissants du e-commerce, ainsi que la boîte rigide pour les produits plus luxueux. 

Pour notre clientèle qui recherche des solutions de boîtes d’emballage en carton plus simples et économiques, Laklé a également développé une gamme de produits « standards » qui pourra répondre à bien des besoins. 

N’hésitez pas à consulter notre section de produits standards, vous y trouverez peut-être ce que vous recherchez.

Quelques uns de nos produits
Boîte d’expédition

Passant de l’utilisation industrielle à la boîte élégante, elle peut emballer les produits les plus variés. Outre les différences les plus évidentes, comme la qualité ou la couleur du carton (généralement blanc ou kraft naturel), la conception d’une boite d’expédition peut faire une énorme différence dans le résultat de sa performance pour vous.

En savoir plus
Boîte pliante
Fiche technique

Il existe une quantité apparemment infinie de styles de boîtes différentes pour les boîtes pliantes « Straight line » avec types de fonds variés, un manchon (sleeve), une boîte oreiller, une boite tulipe, une boite présentoir, une boîte sac, etc. Elles sont sans doute le type de boîte le plus courant auquel le consommateur moyen est le plus souvent exposé.

En savoir plus
Boîte rigide
Fiche technique

Les boîtes rigides sont un type d’emballage très courant et elles sont souvent associées à des produits de luxe. Visuellement attrayantes et structurellement impressionnantes, les boîtes rigides sur mesure transmettent un sentiment de prestige, de luxe, d’élégance et de qualité et sont idéales pour les articles haut de gamme. 

En savoir plus
Jeux de société

Le développement de jeux de société est un processus de grande envergure. Chaque développeur a des méthodes différentes pour créer ses idées et ses concepts qui représentent le cœur de leurs jeux de société. Cependant, il arrive que l’enthousiasme des créateurs soit atténué par des problèmes d’emballage imprévus. 

En savoir plus
VOIR LES PRODUITS SUR MESURE
VOIR LES PRODUITS STANDARDS
GAMME DE NOS SERVICES

Être Maître Boîtier, c’est maîtriser un ensemble de techniques et matériaux variés nécessaires à la conception d’emballage carton, des plus simples aux plus complexes. Depuis plus d’une trentaine d’années, Laklé partage avec vous son expertise et vous offre une gamme complète de services et techniques spécialisés pour réaliser vos projets d’emballages en carton sur mesure. 

Allant du développement de projet et conception complète à l’estampage métallisé et l’impression numérique, en passant par la réalisation d’un prototype ou notre service d’insertion de produits, Laklé a tout sous un même toit pour réaliser votre projet.

Consultez la liste de nos services et n’hésitez pas à communiquer avec nos conseillers pour en savoir plus.

VISITER LA BOUTIQUE EN LIGNE
GAMME THÉMATIQUE
Solutions d’emballage carton adaptées à votre secteur d’activité et besoin

Quel que soit votre secteur d’activité ou votre besoin spécifique, Laklé vous propose une gamme complète de solutions de boîtes d’emballage de qualité pour protéger, mettre en valeur, expédier, vendre ou pour offrir en cadeau tout type de produit.

 

Consultez notre section « Thématique » pour trouver facilement la solution qu’il vous faut.

EN SAVOIR PLUS
POUR VOUS INSPIRER

Afin de mieux comprendre le type de solutions d’emballage innovateur et créatifs qui distinguent Laklé de ses compétiteurs, nous vous proposons de visualiser deux vidéos (voir liens YouTube ci-dessous) qui résument très bien deux projets distincts réalisés et qui nous ont valus des prix Gutenberg dans les catégories « Défi Innovation » et « Défi Technique ». Ces derniers vous permettront de mieux comprendre ce qui distingue Laklé.

VOIR NOS RÉALISATIONS
SUIVEZ-NOUS SUR INSTAGRAM!
SUIVEZ NOUS!
VIDÉOS YOUTUBE

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=c9apmk-Ixbs

NOTRE DÉFI : Recréer un Père-Noël en 3D en utilisant la Découpe Numérique.

Notre choix s’est porté sur une orientation de découpe en angle; nous permettant de donner un relief et des détails plus intéressants à la pièce et ce, en combinant un minimum  de couches de carton.

Une méthode de repérage visuel à même la découpe  a été créée permettant de vérifier à la fois quelle étape était assemblée ainsi que l’exactitude de la séquence d’assemblage. De plus, l’ajout d’un laminage rouge soft touch et  d’un estampage sur carton ondulé demeure toujours un enjeu crucial à cause des flûtes! Les 250 père-noël fabriqués sont identiques malgré les 43 pièces à coller et à  assembler.

Nous avons également créé une boîte d’emballage cheminée en découpe numérique, fabriquée de carton blanc avec laminage blanc velours auquel nous avons ajouté un estampage holographique. Un débossage sur table numérique a également été fait pour le visuel d’imitation de neige et briques sur la boîte.

Audacieux, créatif et innovateur… Voilà qui nous sommes et ce que représente notre défi quotidien! 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=I7ygDe6qKk8

Créer une collection de boîtes offrant une grande protection pour des produits sensibles, mais parfois lourds, sans toutefois sacrifier l’impact du visuel. Voilà notre défi! Nous devions également préserver une constante en adaptant les pièces aux formats spécifiques et aux particularités de chaque produit. Nos défis étaient grands! 

En outre, le positionnement stratégique de l’impression pour la réalisation d’une boîte de transport plus grande que les formats d’impression offset. La conception d’une mécanique d’emballage supportant près de 40 livres, incluant une gaine de plastique sans collage pour extraire le produit de l’emballage de façon sécuritaire. Une bague en étain a été embossée au logo du client afin de maintenir les câbles en place. 

Nous avons lancé un appel aux sens oculaires et au touché avec le choix de la couleur Orange/Blanc et l’ajout d’un fini velours soft-touch. Un concept de boîte d’emballage hybride a également été utilisé (fond rigide / couvercle semi-rigide) apportant ainsi une touche d’élégance et de distinction. Cette collection comprend environ 31 morceaux différents, 7 matières premières et 7 procédés de fabrication également différents les uns des autres. Quel beau défi !

POLYROL s'est donné comme mission de combler les demandes les plus exigeantes de ses clients avec diligence et minutie. C'est pourquoi plus de 500 entreprises parmi les plus prestigieuses oeuvrant dans les domaines des pâtes et papiers, du textile, du plastique, des arts graphiques et de l'emballage font appel à nos services.

POLYROL s'applique à toujours respecter les conditions imposées par ses clients et à leur offrir le meilleur rapport qualité-prix possible. La fiabilité et la courtoisie du service à la clientèle de POLYROL ont façonné une réputation dont nous sommes très fiers.

POLYROL exploite une usine de 40 000 pieds carrés, située à Châteauguay, Québec près des grands centres industriels du Québec et de l'Ontario et à moins de 50 kilomètres de la frontière des États-Unis. Sa grande capacité de production et son aptitude à respecter les délais de livraison sont assurées par de l'équipement et du matériel à la fine pointe de la technologie. Ce qui se traduit par des prix compétitifs, une qualité éprouvée, un service rapide et une grande flexibilité.

POLYROL est fier de pouvoir compter sur une équipe dynamique et chevronné possédant plusieurs années d'expérience. Cette équipe est soutenue par des gestionnaires qualifiés à l'écoute des besoins de sa clientèle et déployant des efforts soutenus afin de maintenir la compagnie à l'avant-garde de l'industrie.

" E. B. Box is committed to providing high quality packaging solutions with exceptional customer service at a competitive price."

E.B. Box Company has been manufacturing custom boxes and standard folding carton boxes since 1972. Our commitment to quality and customer service has allowed us to forge many successful long-term relationships with our clients.

Our in-house die cutting, printing, and gluing capabilities allows us to produce a variety of boxes including computer software, cosmetics, food products, educational, electronics, toys, pharmaceutical, automotive parts, bakery, take-out, business card boxes and various other manufactured goods.

At E.B. Box we are focused on the environment and therefore we only use recycled materials in the manufacturing of our boxes and all of our products are 100% recyclable to the end user.

ABOUT PACIFIC PACKAGING
Mission

Our Mission since 1982; To offer our customers the finest service and the finest cardboard products at the most competitive prices. It is our mission to keep ahead of the competition, and to keep our customers ahead of theirs.

History

Pacific Packaging Products Limited has been an independently owned Canadian corporation specializing in corrugated packaging for over 30 years. Established in 1982, we are a family owned and operated business. Within our company, we have a century of experience.

Services

We manufacture, distribute, import and export corrugated products throughout the world. We operate mostly throughout the Greater Toronto Area & Ontario but we also have excellent service delivering across the country. We offer custom packaging for automotive, pharmaceutical, food & beverage and many more industries. We supply the finest products with the finest service in the corrugated industry.

SEE OUR SERVICES 

GMC Coatings is a division of Channeled Resources. GMC Coating is a manufacturer of narrow width silicone release liners. Our goal is to provide individualized solutions for each of our customer’s specific product needs. We have a team of experts and a lab to test and provide recommendations for release liner engineering projects.

GMC has three coating lines and runs 24 hours per day. We hold standard grades of paper on the floor for two week or less turn around. When it comes to solutions and service, GMC cannot be beat.

Parchment is for more than just lining cookie sheets

From baking and roasting to sautéing and steaming, PaperChef parchment goes far beyond typical kitchen utensils. Culinary Papers is one of the healthiest products in the kitchen, eliminating the need for additional fats and oils from preparation to cooking with PaperChef.

Culinary Parchment 101: PaperChef Culinary Parchment
PLAY VIDEO
From preparation to presentation, and everything in between

Perhaps best known for its use in the classic French “en papillote” style, parchment paper has a long history as a technique for creating refined and sumptuous food. This simple yet elegant culinary tradition infuses the meats, vegetables, and herbs together to create unparalleled flavor and richness.

Oven safe to 425°F, Culinary Parchment’s line of non-stick products, including Cooking Bags, Baking Cups, and Multipurpose Paper seals in nutrients and enhances the food’s natural flavors while virtually eliminating the need for synthetic cooking sprays and high-fat oils.

About Us

Follow us on Twitter

@clverleaffarms

 

We have been a small family owned and operated business since 1984. It all started when my brother in law wanted to learn the butcher trade so he traveled to Germany to stay with family and learn at age 18. His dad, meat manager at Loblaws at the time, and mom a hairdresser and business woman encouraged him to move forward. Once he was home he began making sausage in his basement for fun and eventually started selling at the market. His younger brother, who was in University, ended up joining the business when it began. The processing plant was built a few years later and grew to accommodate the needs of customers demands for their products. I joined the business in 1994 and started working at the St. Jacobs market the day they got their first booth there. I worked at the processing plant and market for 3 years until we opened our first store in November of 1997 on Peel Street in New Hamburg. We opened our second store July 2000 (HWY 7&8 current location) and merged the two stores January of 2008. We are very happy to have the frozen foods & deli in one location!! 

We now sell frozen food; chicken, pork, beef, turkey, fruit, veggies, dessert, fish, fries, finger foods, soups, lasagna, deli items; cold cuts, kielbasa, smoked chops, fresh meats, sandwiches, hot soups, cold drinks, gluten free items,cheese, ready made meals and much more. Our busy deli is a hot spot for lunches and dinners! 

We processed almost all of our beef and pork products and are happy to say that we do not use msg, fillers, wheat or milk in our products. We also do not use fancy preservatives, thus giving our products a home-made taste and quality. We make all of our deli salads and soups at our store and take pride in providing high quality products and service to our customers.  In August of 2016 our beloved processing plant of almost 30 years, burnt down.  We have been blessed by the community support as we are still able to cut and marinate our own products and we have other plants making our processed meats with our recipes and meat. Blessed!! 

We continue to keep our small family owned and operated business at top standards. We are a Provincially Licensed Meat Plant. (we still have our licence and will continue to process once the new plant is built). Our processing plant received a AA rating from the Ontario Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Affairs. This is a huge honour for us. You and your family's safety and satisfaction is of utmost importance!

Well, that's us in a nut shell.
Angie Scheid, Cloverleaf Farms

A standard of quality

CONTACT US

Your partner of choice
in packaging

Port-Royal Packaging Inc. offers custom flexible packaging solutions and we strive to always surpass our customers’ expectations. Among our many services, we offer single-layer or multi-layered films and bags while adhering to international quality and food safety standards. We also offer recyclable and eco-friendly packaging products that produce a neutral carbon footprint.

Since 1983, we are constantly adapting and evolving our techniques and equipment to stay ahead of the ever-changing trends of the industry. With a customer-focused mentality, we commit ourselves to always deliver a quality product with a quick turnaround time, an everyday standard at Port-Royal Packaging Inc.  Having worked with many suppliers and customers within Canada and around the world in various industries, there is no project that we cannot handle. Come see why so many have trusted Port-Royal Packaging Inc. as their partner of choice.

Find out more

A leader in
custom flexible
packaging products

From start to finish, we help guide our clients and are present at every step of the process, from conception of design, testing and manufacturing, to on-time delivery.

Our dedicated customer focused team will keep you up to date on your order so that you can properly manage your timelines and ensure that you receive a product that exceeds expectations. Our attention to detail for every flexible packaging project is important for the success of all our clients.

Our services

Bag/pouch making

Being a customhouse, we can create any pouch to your specifications, such as stand-up pouches, square bottom bags, simplex bags, spout bags, zipper bags, child-proof bags, wicket bags, coffee bags, etc.

Lamination

By combining two or more films together, laminated packaging products offer better shelf life by adding extra protection to environmental agents such as moisture and oxygen. They are also more resistant to tearing and are an overall sturdier end-product. Our solvent-less laminator allows us to eliminate chemicals in the lamination process and our steadfast production team uses the latest techniques to deliver top-quality products. 

Slitting

Rewind slitting is an important step for converters in the flexible packaging industry. We can slit most materials while providing a high precision outcome to our customers.

Printing

We offer 11 colors in rotogravure and 10 colors in flexography printing. We also work with experienced graphic designers who can help our customers conceptualize their ideas and who understand the flexible packaging printing process.

Storage

We understand that storage can be an issue for all. That is why we offer storage services for our customer’s completed packaging products. We will work with you to handle the logistics and the delivery of goods.

Our Packaging materials
Port-Royal Packaging Inc. 

is always updating and expanding the materials and films available to our customers.

Our materials

Kraft Paper

Made from paperboard, kraft paper is characterized by high durability and tear resistance. One of the most common applications is for coffee bags and confectionary bags. 

Polyethylene

Polyethylene is the most common used material in the packaging industry. There are different types of films available, each with their own characteristics and uses. Polyethylene can be recycled.

Polypropylene

Polypropylene is the second most widely used material in the packaging industry. It has a slightly higher melting point than polyethylene and does not react with water and chemicals, making it more resistant.

Biofilms

Due to increased awareness about the environment on the international stage, biofilms are becoming increasingly popular. They are produced using biomass sources, notably cellulose, corn starch and wood pulp. However, it should be noted that not all biofilms are compostable and/or biodegradable. 

Polyester

Polyester is used in the packaging industry, mostly in the lamination process. One of the main reasons for its application is to increase the shelf life of a product. 

Nylon

Due to its high heat resistance, nylon is a popular material when making oven and/or microwavable bags. It is also commonly used in the meat sector.

At the heart of your products since 1991
OUR PRODUCTS
A well-established
expertise

The manufacturing of cardboard tubes is a profession that requires a lot of skill and expertise. The job of a master operator in tube manufacturing is acquired through a complex learning process requiring dexterity, sound judgement and above all, a sustained interest in the profession.

At the very heart of your products, tubes must carry out the winding and unwinding of your products. Compliance with format and resistance are the key elements of their quality.

Your customer will not judge the quality of your product upon receipt, but rather during its use, and the tube is a part of it.

Cores
Convolutes
Angleboards
Laminated Paper Boards
RECYCLABILITY
Manufacture packaging components from recycled materials

At Eco-Pack, we are fully aware that our products are a necessary supply for the manufacturing and/or protection of your products. Therefore, we are equally conscious that our products must be easily and ecologically disposable.

Whether you are using tubes or protective corners, whether we are at the heart of your products or protecting them during packaging, the end consumer will have to dispose of them. This is why the recyclability of our products is so important. At Eco-Pack, we understand the importance that you and your customers place on the environment!

Values

Our Products
Nameplates

Industrial aluminum nameplates are strong, durable and used in a multitude of applications.

	
Anodizing

Anodizing is an electrochemical process which converts the surface of the aluminum into a decorative, durable, corrosion-resistant, anodic oxide finish.

	
Labels & Decals

Labels are a low cost solution which provide bright, colourful graphics using various substrates, including mylar, lexan, vinyl, or foil.

	
Promotional Items

Aluminum nameplates can be used for promotional purposes as well, including business cards, membership cards, promotional campaigns, or rulers.

	
Braille Signs

Macfarlane provides ADA-compliant braille printing and can also be incorporated into promotional products, such as business cards, or cards used for membership or promotional campaigns.

We manufacture high quality spiral-wound paper tubes and cores used in industrial applications all across North America.
As a client of Crown Fibre Tube Inc, you can expect improved efficiencies and profitability in using a superior product customized to match your individual production or application needs.

Systematic testing throughout our production process insures that you get material that matches your physical, functional and visual needs. When you use Crown Fibre Tube products, you get the benefit of a product produced in a state-of-the art facility designed for precision cutting, oven curing and quality assurance.

Industrial Cores
Crown Fibre Tube produces tubes and cores for a full range of industrial and commercial applications. Our flexible approach to meeting customer needs allows us to service clients within the paper, film, flexible packaging, construction, textile, flooring, carpet, automotive and industrial markets.

Fibre Forms
The fast and economical way to erect round concrete columns, piers and footing. During concrete curing, these forms leave in a superior, ultra-smooth concrete surface. Also great for storing carpets and other rollable valuables in the attic or above the garage.

WHY WORK WITH US
40+ Years of Experience
Quality fibre products start with leading innovation.
Unrelenting Quality Control
It is about taking extra care through each step of the process.
State-of-the-Art Facility

Only the most reliable laboratory and testing equipment is used.
In this highly competitive world, success begins with a superior product. We focus on quality at each stage of production so that we deliver only the best end product to you.
Each step of our production process is carefully controlled. This control begins with our quality vendors, we verify our raw material and our checks continue until the finished product is shipped. Crown exercises unrelenting quality control and laboratory analysis.

Our production facility utilizes the most technologically advanced equipment available. We produce tube and core diameters from 1.5 inches (38 mm) to 48 inches (1220 mm), wall thicknesses and lengths to your exacting specifications. This technological edge is reinforced by our constant reinvestment strategy in process improvement.

Our product range covers the majority of applications for precision winding and containment. They are developed to meet the rugged demands of industrial and commercial applications.

When it comes to custom vinyl decals, metal labels, asset tags, digital artwork printing and personalized nameplates in Canada, Identifab Industries is the place to go. Identifab Industries is a leading metal tags, custom labels and vinyl decals manufacturer, producing high-quality custom metal products that exceed your expectations.

Finding a reliable provider for your custom metal tags, labels and nameplates is essential. As an industry leader since 1969, Identifab Industries is a trusted name among metal tags, stickers and label manufacturers.

Whether you need only a handful of tags or a thousand labels, vinyl decals, or nameplates, we can help. We use the latest technology and equipment to produce high-quality custom metal products. With a rich history and legendary quality, the iconic Ticonderoga® is the world's most recognized and trusted pencil. The Ticonderoga® brand also includes erasers, markers, sharpeners and additional products designed to enhance the writing experience.

View Brand

Prang® art supplies have inspired creative expression since 1882. Featuring a full line of high-quality, non-toxic art supplies, Prang® is beloved by children, parents and teachers alike for its bold colors and superior durability.

View Brand

From construction paper to poster board, chenille stems to wiggle eyes, Pacon products inspire students, parents and teachers to let their imagination shine. With trusted brands like Fadeless®, Tru-Ray®, SunWorks®, and Creativity Street®, our educational and art supplies encourage creativity and helps teachers create functional and inspiring learning environments for their students.

View Brand

Tru-Ray® Construction Paper is 100% vat-dyed sulphite construction paper that is tough enough to take scoring, folding and curling without cracking and tearing. It has superior fade-resistance so projects stay brighter and fresher longer...and that's why it's the favorite construction paper for Art Teachers everywhere.

View Brand

Every house needs a solid foundation… and the same applies to your art. Strathmore® has been the paper of choice for artists the world over, including famous artists like Norman Rockwell and Andrew Wyeth. They trusted Strathmore® as the ideal surface for creating their lasting works of art and you can too. Whether your choice of medium is watercolor, charcoal, pastel, pencil or pen and ink, you can be confident that Strathmore® will enhance your artistic efforts!

View Brand

At Daler-Rowney®, our aim is to allow everyone to be creative and strive to be accessible, inclusive and innovative -- offering an outstanding artistic experience to all. We support your creativity because artists are at the core of everything we do. Daler-Rowney®… Inspiring creativity since 1783.

View Brand

With more than 25 colors and 40 designs to choose from, you're sure to find the perfect match for your classroom displays. And because we offer vibrant, fade-resistant colors and designs, you won't have to change your bulletin board backdrops as often. Let Fadeless® spark your imagination, and help you create the classroom you've always wanted.

View Brand

In 1923, the Maimeri® brothers combined art and science to create one of the first artists' paint companies in Italy. Gianni was a painter and his older brother Carlo was a chemist and they combined their talents to create some of the finest artist color the world had ever seen. The tradition carries on today and Maimeri® is the color of choice for discerning artists everywhere.

View Brand

For nearly half a millennium, Canson® has made its papers in Annonay, France and remains a global market leader of the highest-quality papers for artists. You'll find works created on Canson® paper in the world's finest museums. Canson® makes papers for drawing, pastel, watercolor, oil painting, acrylic, graphic arts, printmaking, digital art and photography.
Canson® - Inspirational Papers since 1557

Industrial products have been an integral part of the Dixon® brand since our founding more than 200 years ago as a graphite and mining company. Today, we use that experience to craft our Dixon®-branded precision marking tools, which are known for their durability and effectiveness.

View Brand

The art of creativity. LYRA® is one of the oldest coloring pencil brands in the world. Founded in Germany in 1806, LYRA® has a broad range of quality products for schools, offices and artists. Today, LYRA® is known for its unique, high-quality pencils that set the standard for design and functionality.

In 1827, Joseph Dixon manufactured the first wood and graphite pencil in the country. Today, Dixon® offers a full array of products for schools, offices and industrial applications with quality and durability to stand up to any job, in any environment.

View Brand

The team of dedicated craftsman, representatives and experts at Princeton Brush™ continue to invent tools that move paint and deliver them to the arts community with a passion for both the tools themselves and the artists that use them.

Protecting Our Environment
One Quality Paper Bag At A Time
Welcome To International Paper Converters
Kraft & White Paper Bag Manufacturers in Toronto

International Paper Converters (IPC) proudly manufactures Kraft and White Twisted Handle Paper Bags. We are among the industry leaders who supply recycled and eco-friendly paper bags to Canada, the U.S. and internationally. By partnering with some of North America’s leading paper mills, we are able to offer heavyweight recycled bags that are the perfect solution to retail carryout and restaurant take-out needs. Our Recycled Kraft paper is 100% recycled with 96% Post-Consumer Waste content and is ideal substrate for those concerned about protecting the environment. Our in-house printing team assists our customers through every step of the way to produce custom printed bags of the highest quality and style to brand their company or product.

Our Products
Stock Handle Bags

We are the only makers of custom designed paper twist & stock handle paper bags available in different sizes.

Shopping Bags

Our manufacturers produce retail or shopping bags from durable substrate materials to suit your particular needs.

Gift Bags

Whether you are looking for classy white or kraft paper gift bags to pack gifts, we are expert at manufacturing them.

Grocery Bags

Our traditional SOS grocery bags in white or 100% recycled kraft paper with twisted handles can carry your grocery weight.

Wine Bags

If you want to carry wine bottles with ease, our custom designed wine bags with twisted handles are the best choice.

Take-Out Bags

Our take-out bags are highly durable and leak-resistant, so all food and drink items can be kept safe in the bag.

Hassle-Free Shipping In Canada & US!

At International Paper Converters, we make shipping easy. We serve our clients across North America with efficiency and excellence in mind. Our sales, printing and manufacturing team cater to your needs, budget, and schedule. You get what you need when you need it and at the most competitive price. Should a rush delivery be required, we will be more than happy to do our best to accommodate your request.

About Us

International Paper Converters (IPC) proudly manufactures White and Kraft Twisted Handle Paper Bags of the highest Quality and Durability. We ship throughout North America. Call us today to request a quote.

About Us

In 1994 Patrick Byrne started Power Pak based on the concept of offering “full waste-stream service management” directly to the end-user. Having spent many years in the waste management business, Patrick was concerned with the traditional sales methods being used in the waste industry, that is, match a potential client’s existing service with the same service but at a slightly reduced price. Traditionally, compactor and baler manufacturers sold equipment directly to haulage companies; such equipment however is counterproductive to a haulage companies profit which is based on frequent trash pick-ups. It is not in a haulage company’s best interest to offer equipment for “full waste-stream services” to their clients.

Boîtes RC, le spécialiste de la boîte de carton pliante sur mesure.

L'HISTORIQUE
La fabrication de boîtes en carton pliantes sur mesure, notre savoir-faire depuis 25 ans.

Au fil de ses 25 années d’existence, Boîtes RC a développé une expertise de premier plan dans toutes les étapes de fabrication de boîtes en carton pliantes. Chacune de celles-ci nécessite un savoir-faire spécifique. Grâce à une équipe aguerrie et à des machines performantes, nous sommes en mesure de relever tous les défis et livrer un produit de qualité supérieure.

Welcome to

Your partner
for all your
label needs
Pressure Sensitive Labels
A Pressure Sensitive Label is a major category of adhesive based labels made from a thin flexible material with a single or double-sided coating. These labels can be made in different shapes and sizes to suit the container and can also be made from a variety of substrates including Paper and Poly
Shrink Sleeves & Security Seals
Shrink sleeves provide a brilliant solution for any shaped containers by wrapping themselves around it. The substrate works well with any type of container including metal, plastic and glass
Heat Seal Films
A heat seal pouch is a type of food packaging made from a laminate of flexible plastic films and metal foils to provide a form of appeal, easy transportation and storage with adequate barrier properties to protect the contents
Lidding
These films are used to seal a broad range of substrates for your packaging application requirements. They are primarily used where direct food contact may be required
Multi-ply, Industrial & Promotional Labels
Used when it is required to give more information than there is space available for the label. Can also be used when the top layer of the label needs to be discarded while the bottom layer stays on
Specialty Labels
Apart from the standard products we also offer many types of specialty labels like Piggyback Labels, Void Labels, Laser Sheets, Coupon Labels and PPFP Surlyn
About Us
Flexopartners Inc. has been in the printing business for over 40 years. Our business is printing but our real expertise is producing quality, exciting and innovative labelling solutions for your products. Join Flexopartners, your partner in print, to see your product transform it’s appeal on the shelf

Your go-to source for all things label
Start-to-finish label manufacturing to fit each client’s needs

Labelcraft has been a leading manufacturer of printed custom pressure sensitive labels since 1967. We have always been on the cutting edge. Our Recyclable Enviroliner, the world’s first release liner made of 100% recycled paper that can be recycled, changed the label industry and gave brands a solution to a persistent problem. Now as a Resource Label Group Company, our focus continues to be to help eliminate label waste that is created within our industry and to help divert any label waste away from our landfills.

WE HAVE THE SOLUTIONS!

Canada’s Oil and Gas industry is the cleanest in the world and for 23 years, our mission has been to ensure it remains that way.

From containments to coatings, our mission is what separates us. The success of our mission relies on the success of each and every product we deliver, and we’re not willing to fail Canada’s reputation as the best.

 

OUR SERVICES
INTERNAL TANK & PIPE COATINGS

We are Western Canada’s  trusted provider of high quality protective coating systems, to ensure your investment remains protected from corrosion.  We specialize in internal lining systems of pipe, tanks and vessels.  We sandblast and coat below ground pipes.  

Western Solutions 2000 Ltd. is NACE International (AMPP) corrosion control certified and can complete internal coatings on-site or in our quality controlled facility.

 

PRIMARY & SECONDARY CONTAINMENT

Western Solutions 2000 Ltd. is a leader in corrugated galvanized steel berm systems, dyke containments.  HDPE, LDPE and LLDPE sheet liners.  Urethane Spray Liner.  All products are designed to meet Directive 055 Standard.

EXTERIOR COATINGS/PAINTING

We’ve been sandblasting and painting Tanks, Tank vessels, Service Rig Packages, Service Equipment, Heavy Equipment, Hauling Equipment, Skids, etc. since we were founded 23 years ago.

Other coatings include bed liners, lowers, camper front-ends, holiday trailer/RV roof repair, as well as urethane spray foam insulation.

INNOVATION

In our mission to make our industry cleaner, safer, and more resilient, it’s our duty to stay up to date on the latest technology, or create it for ourselves. As a result, we were the first company in Western Canada to implement robotic spray applied geomembranes.

SAFETY

A dedicated National Construction Safety Officer and long-standing COR compliance are testaments of our commitment to the health and safety of our employees, partners, and clients. 

AREAS SERVED

While Drayton Valley, Alberta is home to us, we’ve been to every corner of the West to ensure our clients are getting the best products and service available. Over the last two decades we have familiarized ourselves with the challenges, policies, and regulations that accompany working inter-provincially.

Label Design is a fully SQF Food Certified manufacturing operation located in Guelph.

We specialize in pressure sensitive labels, selling primarily in Ontario and throughout Canada.​

By continuously renewing our technology and maintaining focus on quality and customer needs,

Label Design has grown steadily since its foundation in 1990. ​

LEARN MORE
Household & Apparel​

Designed to fit a wide variety of shapes, contours and surfaces and to ensure your brand will be seen and chosen first.

Learn More
Industrial ​

Your label must adhere to multiple surfaces under challenging conditions. We have the expertise to ensure outstanding performance.

Learn More
Food

High end, food certified labels that will make your product stand out on the shelf with excellent consumer appeal.

Learn More
Automotive ​

Automotive labels are essential for the accurate tracking of components. Proper adhesion to tough surfaces must be ensured.

Learn More
Health & Personal Care​

Packaging is everything in this category. Our state of the art printing technology will give your brand the high end shelf appeal it needs.

Learn More
Specialty

Promotional and extended content labels provide consumers the information they need, and help to increase sales.

Learn More
Capabilities

Speed to market and customer satisfaction can only be achieved by acquiring state of the art systems, outstanding printing technology and by hiring the best people.

At Label Design, we have friendly and knowledgeable staff that will handle all your needs at every stage, from cost estimates to artwork management to delivery updates. We can print up to 10 colors using UV curable or water based inks on our state of the art printing presses.​ Our quality control includes photo vision systems both on press and on the converting equipment that check every label to ensure a perfect product, every time.

Sustainability

As the packaging industry is under increased pressure to develop green technologies and products, Label Design has put in place a strategy to help our customers achieve their sustainability goals.

Label Design is closely integrated with its suppliers to secure access to materials that meet today’s evolving sustainability goals. ​We have the in-house expertise and will work with you to review your packaging portfolio and applications, provide practical advice and actionable items on how to make your packaging greener. ​Moreover, Label Design will help you with your liner waste recycling needs.​

Get In Touch

Do you have a question about Label Design Ltd., our products, or services?  We would welcome an opportunity to be of assistance on your next project and invite you to call us toll-free at 1-888-488-9930, or use the contact form to get in touch.

For your accessibility needs, please contact Manuel Garces, General Manager at 519-763-3563 or manuel@labeldesign.ca.

COVID-19 Protocol
Label Design Ltd. is considered an “Essential Service” and will remain open during Red Zone; Grey Zone or State of Emergency designations but with limited access to visitors.  Our safety procedures are in accordance with current Public Health and Ministry regulations.  Please call ahead to book an appointment and/or to request a copy of our COVID-19 Safety Plan.

NANOFILMS • GRAPHENE • TECH
Transforming today’s technology with tomorrow’s advanced materials

We’re creating advanced material manufacturing processes that can solve some of the world’s biggest environmental issues.

Our ultra-thin nanofilms can curb greenhouse gas emissions by radically reducing the energy required for commercial and residential air conditioning and dehumidification systems. They can transform seawater into drinking water in drought-prone areas. They can improve batteries and solar cells, making renewable energy more viable. They can even help stop the spread of COVID-19.

And thanks to our patented technology, we can manufacture large sheets of these nanofilms efficiently and affordably, positioning us at the forefront of cleantech and climate tech innovation.

ABOUT




RMAC Surgical Inc., founded in 1996 is a leading provider of high-quality medical products to surgical facilities across the US and Canada.

Our flagship product is our  PharmaTags: Sterile Medication Label Kits designed to enhance patient safety and improve medication identification during surgical procedures.  Customize your label kits with the medication labels YOU need to meet the specific requirements of your facility.  Do not settle for label kits that are pre-printed with generic information; instead, design one that caters precisely to the unique demands of your surgical needs.


PharmaTags:

Sterile Medication Label Kits

Essential for maintaining safety and compliance in Surgical environments.




Comprehensive Labeling Solutions

We offer a complete range of sterile and non-sterile custom medication label kits, enhancing the safety and efficiency of surgical environments through reliable and innovative medical solutions.




Free Customization of your Label Kits. 

Simply complete our form to get started with your customized PharmaTags designed exactly as you need them to be. Optimize your surgical sterile label kits today.










Our founder, a former Perioperative Registered Nurse and Cardiovascular Perfusionist, has pioneered RMAC Surgical into a globally respected leader in medication safety on the sterile field.  Our dedication to enhancing surgical medication safety and efficiency continues to drive the company's innovation and success.







Commitment to Safety

RMAC Surgical is dedicated to improving patient and staff safety with a variety of industry-leading products.







FOUNDED IN 1996
Incorporated 2002


 




GLOBAL LEADER IN HEALTHCARE

 




INNOVATIVE MEDICAL SOLUTIONS



		










PRODUCTS



Comprehensive Medical Product Solutions




RMAC Surgical Inc. provides a wide range of medical products to enhance surgical environments. Our offerings include custom medication label kits, sterile and non-sterile, tailored to meet your facility's unique needs.




We prioritize safety and efficiency, delivering innovative solutions for surgical facilities. From patient to staff safety products, we ensure reliability and excellence in our medical product range.






	

Commitment to Quality and Innovation




Since 1996, we've built a reputation for quality and innovation in the healthcare industry. Our founder's expertise drives us to offer products that meet the highest standards.

 

Rmac Surgical Inc. remains dedicated to advancing surgical care through dependable and forward-thinking products. Our goal is to ensure safe and efficient operations across the United States and Canada.

OBTENEZ UNE SOUMISSION!
Caisses de carton ondulé sur mesure pour votre entreprise de Montréal et des environs

La rentabilité de votre entreprise et la qualité de l’emballage de vos produits demandent des solutions qui sont adaptées à vos besoins spécifiques. C’est pourquoi Jesswood Emballages conçoit, fabrique et livre des caisses de carton ondulé créées sur mesure à Montréal. Vous obtenez des produits d’emballage durables, dont toutes les composantes sont pensées en fonction de votre secteur d’activités et des produits que vous fabriquez.

LA SOLUTION LOGIQUE À VOS BESOINS D’EMBALLAGE

Depuis 1985, nous offrons des solutions d’emballage rentables pour des clients de plusieurs industries, dont celles de l’alimentation, de l’agriculture, de l’imprimerie, des produits pharmaceutiques, des plastiques et bien d’autres. Ayant le même propriétaire et allant dans la même direction depuis notre création, nous nous engageons à fournir des caisses en carton ondulé d’une qualité constante, ainsi qu’une livraison rapide afin de respecter vos délais d’opération. Nous nous adaptons à vos besoins exacts, quelle que soit la quantité.

NOTRE MÉTHODE DE FABRICATION RESPECTUEUSE DE L’ENVIRONNEMENT

Notre usine de fabrication moderne produit du carton ondulé à paroi simple à cannelure en A, B, C et E et à paroi double à cannelure en BC, AC et BE. Nos installations sont pensées en fonction de la productivité, ce qui vous permet d’obtenir des produits abordables, mais aussi en fonction du respect de l’environnement. Nous pouvons ainsi réduire notre empreinte énergétique tout en vous offrant des caisses de carton ondulé d’une grande qualité faites à partir de matériaux recyclés.

Passez votre commande dès aujourd’hui en contactant notre équipe!

DES SOLUTIONS SUR MESURE

VOICI COMMENT

NOTRE ENGAGEMENT

APPRENEZ-EN PLUS

VOUS AVEZ DES QUESTIONS?

K2 LABEL Inc.

CALL US : (416) 576 -1057

With over 25 years of experience in the labelling industry, K2 Label Inc. understands the importance of competitively priced, premium quality products combined with first class Customer Service.

​

Our label production capabilities include Thermal Transfer, Direct Thermal, Paper & Synthetic Face Stocks, Semi-Gloss and High Gloss “Prime” Labels with up to 10 Colour Printing, Variable Imprinting, Laser Sheets and much more.  Simply put......if you have a label requirement, we can do it.

​

All of our label and ribbon products are certified for use in all makes and models of Thermal Printers and Automatic Labelling equipment including; Zebra, Sato and Datamax & Intermec. 

​

From plain white thermal labels used for shipping applications......right through to Multi-Coloured, laminated, Polypropylene labels used in extreme weather conditions (such as freezers).....we have yet to find a labelling problem we can’t solve.  With a countless selection of face stocks and adhesives to choose from, let a K2 Label specialist find the one that’s right for you.

​

For a no obligation quote, or to have an on-site labelling system survey conducted by one of our specialists, please feel free to contact us.

At K2 Label, we consider ourselves as your partner....not just another supplier.

​

Call and find out why K2 Label is Above & Beyond Printing........and let us help your business, reach its peak.

Insulation & Thermal Experts

When it comes to insulation, you need a high quality, environmentally friendly insulation that saves money. Take comfort in choosing the best insulation from Therm-O-Comfort.

CONTACT US
VIEW OUR PRODUCTS
ONTARIO HOME RENOVATION SAVINGS PROGRAM
Therm-O-Light

Loose-fill thermal & acoustical cellulose fiber insulation (CFI)

Therm-O-Spray

Spray-applied thermal & acoustical cellulose fibre insulation (CFI)

Equipment & Accessories

New and refurbished blowing & spraying machinery

Not all companies
are the same.

Choosing the right company is as tough as choosing the right insulation. The cost of removing and replacing a poor insulation product is difficult and often prohibitively expensive. Not only do you want a product you can count on but a company that stands behind their products with a comprehensive warranty.

Therm-O-Comfort is dedicated to addressing the issues most important to building owners, designers, contractors, and occupants. Quality, service, flexibility, environmental responsibility, and health and safety are the objectives we share with you.

Who uses our products?
Homeowners

Whether it is topping up your attic or soundproofing the floor above your basement, Therm-O-Comfort can provide you with the right advice or installer referral to get the job done properly. We can provide detailed project instructions and installation tips.

Builders

Therm-O-Comfort also ensures quality within your company’s commitment to building a more sustainable, energy efficient, and healthier home as well as offering a cost competitive product. Cellulose fibre insulation is the natural choice.

Architects & Engineers

When it comes to specifying insulation, you need a reliable product backed by an established company with a proven track record. Therm-O-Comfort is a company with a reputable and stable background and has the resources to back its products.

We Buy Recycled Paper

If you are an individual, non-profit organization, or company wishing to earn extra income or generate funds for your project or activities, Therm-O-Comfort would like to speak with you.

Paper can either be dropped off at our manufacturing facility in St Thomas or we can arrange pick up service. Conditions apply.

Supplying Packaging and Covering Solutions to Canada

BWI is a premier supplier and manufacturer of quality, cost-effective packaging and covering solutions in Canada. We specialize in FIBC (bulk bags), PP Woven Sacks, Tarps, and Covers, catering to a diverse range of industries. Our reputation stands strong on the pillars of quality, customer service, and local manufacturing expertise. BWI is Canada’s only supplier and domestic manufacturer of bulk bags. Our dedication lies in delivering top-tier packaging and covering products, combined with local manufacturing solutions tailored for various applications and industries.

Custom Polyethylene Packaging Since 1956

With over 60 years of experience, Salerno Packaging, Inc. has the expertise and facilities to produce your custom-printed poly bags for your salt, horticulture, building materials, and chemical products. We handle the entire process in-house from extruding the film, to printing & converting, to adding custom features. High-end graphics keep your branding looking great and easily recognizable on the shelf.

Contact Us Learn About Our Products
Products & Capabilities

Salerno Packaging, Inc. has the equipment and capabilities necessary to complete your custom bag project, with our Plattsburgh, NY and Chateauguay, Quebec production facilities. Talk to our service and design team to get started today!

Contact Us
Capabilities

At Salerno Packaging, we manage the entire production process in-house. Starting as small as 12” width bags and going up from there to meet your custom packaging needs.

Three-layer co-ex and mono extrusion
Wide web line and process printing front and back:
Up to 10 colors
U-Film (for Horizontal Form-Fill-Seal applications)

Product Types:

FFS / Roll Stock:
U-Film, J-Film, Single Wound Sheeting, Tubing, Gusseted Tubing.

Bag Styles:

Bottom seal bags:
embossing, corner seals, side gussets, gusset tack seals, reinforced soft handles, EZ open features, high temp blends.

bottom gusset, off-set lip.
Salt

Our three-layer tubing or wide web FFS-U-film keeps bags strong without a side seam. With twisted tube printing, we can add side panel graphics, and U-film allows for bottom panel graphics. With many added features, your salt product will stand out from the competition.

Horticulture

Your custom soils, mulches, peat moss, wood pellets, wood shavings, and firewood require clear printing and strong packaging to preserve the contents. Salerno Packaging offers wide web sheeting, process and line printing, as well as corner seals, handles, and embossing to meet your needs and the needs of your customers.

Building Materials

Large tube and long repeat bags, as well as gusseted FFS and shrink FFS are ideal for insulation packaging for the building industry.

Chemical

Chemical packaging needs extra strength to protect the end-user by not tearing or spilling. Salerno Packaging has several options for chemical bags:

3-layer tubing
Special fill composition, high temp, batch inclusion
Gusseted tubing
Roll stock

Ecofriendly corrugated packaging manufacturer

Maritime Paper Products LP is the leading manufacturer of Corrugated Packaging in Atlantic Canada. It has three manufacturing facilities located on the east coast of Canada, with convenient access to a major shipping port for easy export worldwide.

Maritime Paper produces high-quality corrugated packaging products, including the standard brown shipping carton, 7 color flexographic printing, retail displays, specialty folding, die cuts, wax cascaded cartons, and bulk bins. 

Everything is riding on the choices you’ve made, the partner you’ve selected, and the boxes protecting your product.

 

We have the experience and technology to be that partner. 




Maritime Paper Products Limited Partnership prides itself on being one of the industry’s most technically advanced companies.

ABOUT THE COMPANY

In 1994, the founders of Polar Magnetics Inc. came together to create thick die cut magnets using a variety of different artwork.

Using a process referred to as “laser cut wood mounted art” the images were mounted to wood and, using laser cutting machines, cut out in very accurate shapes creating a unique 2D reproduction.

Since then, this method was perfected using a variety of different materials and thickness as well as modern printing techniques to produce many premium products of great quality for North American retailers.

We ensure that our processes meets all regulatory requirements and that all of our raw material suppliers do the same.

WHAT WE DO

We are a leading manufacturer of souvenirs, promotional and custom products for the North American marketplace. Our products include:

Scrap en masse is your go-to hub for all things arts and scrapbooking in Canada. Whether you're a seasoned scrapbooker or just getting started, we offer a wide range of scrapbooking supplies that cater to every creative need. From beautifully designed papers and embellishments to high-quality tools and adhesives, our selection ensures that your artistic projects stand out.

Explore our extensive collection of scrapbooking supplies Canada enthusiasts trust. We understand the importance of having the right materials to bring your creative visions to life. That’s why we stock only the best products, ensuring your scrapbooking experience is seamless and enjoyable.

Join Our Art Classes and Elevate Your Craft

Looking to sharpen your skills or learn new techniques? Our art classes are perfect for anyone looking to dive deeper into the world of scrapbooking and arts. Our experienced instructors guide you through each step, helping you master various techniques and create stunning projects. Whether you're interested in card making, mixed media, or traditional scrapbooking, we have a class tailored for you.

Ready to embark on your next creative adventure? Visit Scrap en masse today and stock up on all your scrapbooking supplies. Don’t miss out on the opportunity to join our art classes and take your creativity to the next level. Start your artistic journey with us, and let your imagination run wild.

DES EMBALLAGES SOLIDES,
DES EXPÉDITIONS SANS SOUCIS

Unipack offre une expertise reconnue dans l’emballage, des solutions personnalisées sur mesure et un service client exceptionnel, attentif et réactif.

VOIR NOS SERVICES
NOS SPÉCIALISATIONS

Carton Unipack produit des boîtes régulières, des boîtes découpées, des partitions et des boîtes sur mesure en carton ondulé offrant une protection maximale. Solides et confectionnées à votre image, nos boîtes répondent aux plus hautes exigences de manutention de transport en d’entreposage. Nous offrons aussi le service d’impression de visuel sur les boîtes et emballages. L’impression est réalisée sur nos presses en noir ou en couleur selon vos besoins.

Séparateur sur-mesure

L’emballage sur mesure de Carton Unipack répond parfaitement à vos besoins spécifiques.

VOIR CETTE SOLUTION
Boîte à rabat

Qu’elle soit régulière ou superposée, elle offre une solution d’emballage pratique et polyvalente.

VOIR CETTE SOLUTION
Demi boîte

Elle offre une solution pratique et polyvalente pour la présentation de produits.

VOIR CETTE SOLUTION
Enveloppe 4 coins coupés

Découvrez nos enveloppes 4 coins et 5 panneaux, deux solutions d’emballage adaptées à vos besoins spécifiques.

VOIR CETTE SOLUTION
Boîte Sur-mesure

D’autres types de boîtes spécifiques ou des solutions d’emballage personnalisées.

VOIR CETTE SOLUTION
Autres solutions

Nous vous offrons une grande gamme de produits standard qui répondra efficacement à vos besoins.

VOIR CETTE SOLUTION
NOS SERVICES

Chez Carton Unipack, nous ne nous contentons pas de fournir des boîtes en carton. Nous nous engageons à offrir à nos clients un service 5 étoiles qui va au-delà de leurs attentes.

Notre équipe dévouée est là pour vous accompagner à chaque étape de votre projet d’emballage, en vous offrant un service personnalisé, des conseils d’experts et une attention méticuleuse aux détails

VOIR NOS SERVICES
NOTRE APPORT POUR LES ENTREPRENEURS

Il peut être parfois difficile de visualiser un projet. Nous offrons à tous nos clients un service d’échantillonnage. Avec un visuel en main et l’aide de notre équipe, vous pourrez faire un choix éclairé et adapté à votre projet.

Vous manquez de place pour vos solutions d’emballage ? Nous pensez que l’entreposage de vos emballages pourrait impacter votre production ? Nous pouvons faire la gestion de votre inventaire et ainsi vous offrir de l’espace supplémentaire pour votre entreprise.

Aucune quantité minimum de boîtes n’est requise. Quel que soit votre projet, nous pourrons vous accompagner et voir les meilleures solutions possibles.

VOIR NOTRE EXPERTISE
	
LIVRAISON RAPIDE

	
FABRIQUER AU CANADA
	
SERVICE CLIENT PERSONNALISÉ
NOTRE EXPERTISE

Carton Unipack se distingue par son accompagnement spécialisé. Nous vous proposons une solution clé en main adaptée à votre projet. Notre équipe prend en charge votre projet comme si c’était le sien et analyse vos produits et vos besoins afin de vous offrir la meilleure solution possible.

FABRICANT
DE BOÎTES PLIANTES
ET D'EMBALLAGES CRÉATIFS.

Nous sommes conscients que l'emballage joue un rôle crucial en tant que lien entre vos clients et vos produits. Chargé de mettre en valeur ces derniers, l'emballage peut souvent influencer la décision d'achat de vos clients.

Chez Evoopak, notre équipe de spécialistes est dédiée à vous aider à trouver des solutions optimales pour créer des emballages performants qui mettront en valeur vos produits, tout en veillant à obtenir le meilleur rapport qualité-prix possible. Nous comprenons l'importance de l'emballage dans l'expérience d'achat de vos clients et nous nous engageons à vous fournir des solutions qui répondront à vos besoins spécifiques.

NOS PRODUCTIONS

boîte pliante
boîte sans colle
boîte en carton plat
boîte en carton microcannelures
boîte pour produits commerciaux
boîte haut de gamme (cadeau de prestige)
et beaucoup plus

NOS SERVICES

conception structurelle
dessin de matrice
maquette prototype
impression
découpage
pliage
collage
ouverture fenêtre plastifiée
finition
livraison partout en Amérique

SECTEURS D'ACTIVITÉ

agroalimentaire
cosmétique
pharmaceutique
laboratoire
électronique
industriel
commercial

FABRICATION ET FINITION
BIEN ÉQUIPÉ,
POUR TRÈS BIEN RÉALISER

Notre entreprise se distingue par son savoir-faire dans le domaine de l'emballage.

Nous proposons une gamme complète de services axés sur la qualité, la flexibilité et la rapidité pour répondre aux exigences spécifiques de nos clients.

En tirant profit de la qualité d'impression de nos presses, nous hissons nos boîtes et emballages aux normes de qualité les plus élevées de l'industrie tout en assurant d’offrir des prix très compétitifs.

VITE... TRÈS VITE et bien...
rien de moins!

Dans le monde de la distribution, la réactivité est cruciale car tout peut changer rapidement. Nous comprenons les besoins de nos clients quand il s'agit de commandes de dernière minute, de modifications de quantités ou de points de livraison supplémentaires. La flexibilité est notre force et nous sommes fiers de répondre aux exigences de nos clients, même lorsqu'il faut faire preuve de prouesses.

MAQUETTE ET PROTOTYPE
PLUS SIMPLE, PLUS FACILE
AVEC NOTRE SERVICE DE MAQUETTES
ET PROTOTYPES

Facilitez la préparation de vos projets avec notre service de maquettes et de prototypes. Nous vous guiderons dans le choix des matériaux appropriés, des formats les mieux adaptés et nous vous fournirons la meilleure conception technique pour obtenir le meilleur prix.

Lors de la conception d'un emballage, plusieurs facteurs doivent être pris en compte. Il peut parfois être difficile de s'y retrouver. Au-delà du format, le choix du carton, la planification de la découpe et de l'assemblage de la boîte, la méthode d'insertion des produits et l'entreposage doivent également être considérés.

Nous vous garantissons une véritable assistance technique pour trouver les bons matériaux, les formats les mieux adaptés et surtout, pour maximiser la conception technique afin d'obtenir le meilleur rapport qualité-prix. Notre équipe est là pour vous guider à chaque étape du processus, s'assurant que votre emballage réponde à vos besoins spécifiques de manière efficace et économique.

Service-conseil pour supporter votre équipe de graphistes.

Dessin de matrice afin de faciliter le travail des concepteurs visuels.

Fabrication de prototype avec les matériaux de production .

Prise en charge de votre projet par un concepteur d’emballage qui agira comme chargé de projet et ce, du début jusqu’à la livraison de vos emballages.

NOS PRODUCTIONS
LA BOÎTE PLIANTE vedette incontournable de l'alimentation

En raison de sa polyvalence, la boîte pliante est largement adoptée dans le domaine de l’alimentation. Le secteur alimentaire occupe une partie importante de notre production.

Par conséquent, notre expertise dans ce domaine constitue un avantage majeur pour nos clients.

Bien que plusieurs modèles de boîtes pliantes soient considérés comme des standards, il est toujours possible d’adapter et d’innover. Notre équipe du département de design possède les compétences pour trouver la solution idéale répondant à vos exigences techniques spécifiques.

LA BOÎTE POUR LES LABORATOIRES
c'est le côté chic,
version scientifique.

Conçue sur mesure pour les laboratoires dentaires, cette boîte allie robustesse et élégance. Équipée de séparateurs intérieurs adaptés aux formats des produits, elle assure une protection optimale lors du transport.

Chez Evoopak, la personnalisation va au-delà des attentes pour répondre précisément à vos exigences uniques. Nous ajustons facilement les formats, le style de découpe, la méthode d'assemblage et les matériaux pour obtenir un emballage performant sous tous ses aspects.

INDUSTRIEL, COMMERCIAL OU PROMOTIONNEL, les défis sont variés et ils requièrent des solutions novatrices.

Il faut une approche créative et innovante pour se démarquer dans la conception d'emballages ou de présentoirs. Que ce soit par l'utilisation de matériaux novateurs, par des pliages audacieux ou par des assemblages inédits, chaque détail compte. C'est cette attention à la créativité qui permet de créer des solutions uniques et mémorables, ajoutant une valeur distinctive à votre produit et en renforçant l'impact visuel sur le marché. Chez nous, chaque projet est une opportunité d'explorer de nouvelles perspectives pour offrir des emballages et présentoirs qui captivent l'attention.

COSMÉTIQUE OU PHARMACEUTIQUE.

La boîte pliante, flexible et conçue avec un carton plat de qualité, présente un raffinement esthétique dans les secteurs pharmaceutique et cosmétique. Notre large gamme de matériaux, combinée à des finitions distinctives, vous offre la possibilité de personnaliser vos boîtes, affirmant ainsi votre image de marque sur les divers points de vente.

QUELQUES RÉALISATIONS

Sur notre galerie, vous découvrirez quelques-uns des projets que nous avons réalisés pour des clients issus de divers domaines d'activité. Vous constaterez la polyvalence de notre équipe et son aptitude à répondre à une variété de besoins créatifs et techniques.

VISITER LA GALERIE

Voici un aperçu de nos boîtes pliantes conçues spécifiquement pour les produits alimentaires. Leur construction intelligente permet un assemblage rapide, économisant ainsi un temps précieux. Une solution pratique et efficace pour répondre aux besoins dynamiques de l'industrie alimentaire, tout en assurant une présentation optimale de vos produits.

Voici un excellent exemple de créativité : cet emballage porte-carte est fabriqué d'une seule pièce, sans aucun collage. De plus, il est muni d'une action automatique qui soulève la carte cadeau au moment d'ouvrir la boîte, ajoutant ainsi une touche d'innovation et d'interaction à l'expérience.

Boite splendide fabriquée avec un carton microcannelure recouverte d’un carton plat estampé à chaud avec une plastification soft touch qui donne un effet tactile soyeux et velouté. Cette boîte pour laboratoire est un bel exemple qui allie le côté chic et raffiné tout en étant très résistant.

Nos emballages sont minutieusement conçus en tenant compte de la nature des produits et de l'exigence liées au stockage. Cette approche garantit une préservation optimale de la qualité que ce soit pour des articles frais ou surgelés.

From POS units to inkjet heavyweights – they all come with the latest printing features to streamline your business and are backed by comprehensive warranties from manufacturers.

Best label printers and supplies to go beyond your business expectations

Multipurpose and affordable label printers

Creating barcodes, tickets, tags, wristbands, membership cards, and more

Here at ASD Laminat, we harness the pristine and subtle elegance of nature into sustainable building materials and contemporary architectural solutions. Power of big thinking, experience, knowledge, excellent quality and a visionary management is what forges us ahead. In the pursuit of perfection, we believe in bettering ourselves in everyway and everyday than the day before.
We produce with 65 years of experience.

ASD Laminat provides decorative laminates to over the 85 countries by observing the environmental policies of respect for nature and sustainability in all processes from A to Z, from the latest trend decorative papers to surface technologies that meet every need.

With the latest trend decorative papers and advanced surface technologies, we bring our products that meet the dynamic needs of daily life to our customers.

ASD Laminat always developing our High-pressure laminate (HPL) and Continuous High Pressure Laminate (C-HPL) lines in manufacturing process. Working on smart surface technologies for userfriendy, resistant and safety products.

ASD Laminat believes that every sector and usage area has its own unique and special needs. For this reason, it develops special solutions for different usage areas.

How To Get Started

Thanks for taking the time to learn more about some of the amazing products we offer. At NLI we provide more than a selection of products – our company is strategically designed & products specifically curated to help you produce more measurable growth.

This website is intended for you to browse and learn more about NLI. Once your registration is approved, you’ll be able to submit your wish list to one of our sales reps for pricing! Feel free to reach out with any product inquiries or requests, our team is here and happy to help.

Why Us?

We take pride in the values that make us who we are.

Extensive Experience

NLI has been a key supplier within the premium incentives and loyalty landscape in Canada for over 20 years. NLI Corporate begun in 2007 as a one-stop shop for manufacturers and distributors, to introduce their products to membership-only buying groups. The growth in online presence of major Canadian retailers enabled NLI to successfully grow from the incentives and loyalty markets to the ultra competitive world of online retail.

Committed To Customer Satisfaction

NLI’s driving strength has been the ability to partner with leading brands and provide exceptional industry-leading customer service. We recognize that outstanding customer satisfaction lies in the consistent delivery of an exceptional purchase & service experience.

Prompt Delivery

NLI has successfully partnered with international manufacturers creating distribution channels that thrive in the Canadian market. We also provide intelligent and unparalleled logistic solutions through our partnership with our sister company NLI International.

Follow Us

Stay up to date with NLI Solutions news & product trends! Follow us on social media.

Proudly manufacturing labels in Saint John since 1987.

A family-owned and operated label company specializing in crafting top-notch custom labels tailored to your unique needs. 

QUALITY LABELS

Our company efficiently manages professional label orders, accommodating quantities ranging from 5,000 to one million units.

GRAPHIC DESIGN

Our comprehensive services encompass the entire process of label creation, from design to delivery, ensuring a seamless experience for our customers. As part of this commitment, we offer complimentary personalized graphic design assistance by our in-house expert, Michael, for all label orders, guaranteeing exceptional quality and value.

TOSHIBA TEC DEALER

As a dealer for Toshiba Tec, we specialize in selling their ink ribbons and professional machines. Our expertise extends to creating labels specifically designed for use with these machines, ensuring a seamless integration between the two. The combination of Toshiba Tec machines and our labels offers a comprehensive solution for labeling needs.
