Home
About us
Our Products
Contact Us
Get a Quote
Leaders in
Quality & Innovation

Set Youself Apart From the Competition

Learn More
Reliable Manufacturing

Whether innovating an existing product line or wanting to set one apart, Triumbari can make it happen. Our manufacturing process operates in an economically feasible manner while providing the high quality our customers have come to rely on.

We specialize in the blow molding manufacturing of PET containers for the beverage industry as well as the beauty, health, medical, household, food and many other industries.

Top Quality Selection

Triumbari’s markets include, but are not limited to, Water, CSD, Liquid Products, Edible Oils, juice, sauces, beauty products, vitamins, supplments, medical containers, food product containers, and many other types of containers.

We offer clear, blue, green, and amber stock PET bottles for immediate use. Through our relationships with colourant suppliers; we have the ability to offer a large range of colours to fit our customers’ unique needs. In addition to colour, we can produce a variety of custom and unique PET containers for the food and beverage industry, beauty industry, pharmaceutical industry, medical industry, etc.

Expert Guidance

Utilizing our industry expertise we can help guide our customer’s through the process of choosing correct sizes, styles and gram weights to best fit their needs. We offer assistance in:

· Engineering and Engineered Drawings
· Prototyping
· Modeling
· Product Development
· Custom Tooling and Packaging
· Product samples
· Finished goods & shipment co-ordination

As Little As 6 Weeks

From Design
To Production

Triumbari excels at custom design and can create a custom bottle for you, and put you into full production in as little as 6 weeks.

Our state of the art manufacturing facility, strategically located near Toronto, Ontario, Canada, allows for ease of access into the North Eastern, Mid Southern and Mid Western states as well as Eastern and Central Canada.

Our
Products

Triumbari specializes in product design and customization, and also offers over 100 different stock PET containers. Products include: stock bottles, stock CSD bottles, preforms, and more.

HANDLES & MATERIALS
Rope handles- both cotton and nylon, die-cut and half-moon handles, twisted paper handles, soft loop handles, drawstring, nylon webbing handles, ribbons… so many handle options.

Paper bags- Recycled, post-consumer, kraft, art, woodfree. Plastic bags- polyethylene, high density, low density, recycled, post-consumer, biodegradable, photodegradable.

The choice is yours!
ENVIRONMENTALLY-FRIENDLY
Multi Bag is dedicated to providing environmentally friendly and sustainable packaging choices by continuously reducing our environmental impact throughout the lifecycle of our shopping bags.
Contact us to learn more!
PRINTING & DESIGN
Custom made just for you! The style, shape, size, materials, handles, printing and graphics of our bags are all produced according to your specifications.

We can print any number of colours requested. One, two, three, four….as many as needed, up to fourteen. 4 colour process printing- your graphics and pictures will look exquisite. Quality colours and clean lines!

Browse our samples for ideas!
WAREHOUSING & DISTRIBUTION
At Multi Bag, we have decades of experience in warehousing, inventory, distribution and logistics management.

Our 75,000 square ft warehouse facility can satisfy your needs today and accommodate future requirements as your organization grows and your demands change.

Contact us to learn more!
GLOBAL RETAIL & WHOLESALE SUPPLIER
Retail Chain Stores, Boutiques, Garment Trade, Shopping Malls, Restaurants, Governments (Municipal/Provincial/State), Universities.

Whether you have hundreds of retail outlets worldwide, a handful of local restaurants, 50 student dorms or a municipality with millions of residents, we have the production capacity and distribution expertise to manufacture and supply your organization with the bags you need.

Contact us to learn more!

Confetti / Streamer Sales

Streamer Effects is a vibrant and innovative company dedicated to spreading joy and excitement through its colorful array of confetti products. Our company has quickly become a go-to source for individuals and event planners looking to add a touch of magic to their celebrations. From birthdays and weddings to corporate events and grand openings, we offer a diverse range of confetti options to suit every occasion.

Our commitment to quality and sustainability. We source biodegradable materials for our confetti, ensuring that the festivities don't harm the environment. This eco-friendly approach has resonated with customers who are increasingly conscious of their ecological footprint. We take pride in being a pioneer in the confetti industry, setting a standard for responsible celebration.

Streamer Effect's online platform serves as a user-friendly hub where customers can explore the wide range of products, access inspiration for creative confetti displays, and place orders with ease. The company has also established a strong presence on social media, engaging with its community and showcasing the diverse ways in which confetti can elevate any event. With our dedication to customer satisfaction, environmental responsibility, and innovation, we continue to be a leader in the world of celebratory embellishments, turning ordinary moments into extraordinary memories. NEED A CORRUGATED BOX, WE CAN HELP.

We are proud to be a trusted provider of high-quality corrugated boxes in Winnipeg – Manitoba, and beyond.

Fast and reliable: Whether you’re placing a small order or a large bulk order, you can trust that we will work diligently to get it to you as quickly as possible. Our experienced team is committed to providing reliable service that you can count on.

Quality Products: We use high-quality materials and manufacturing processes to ensure that our boxes are durable and provide reliable protection for your products. We take pride in the quality of our boxes, and we stand behind our products.

Exceptional Service: We are committed to providing exceptional service that meets your needs and exceeds your expectations. Our team is here to answer any questions you may have and to ensure that your order is completed to your satisfaction.

Customization Options: We offer a wide range of customization options, including custom sizes, printing, and design. Our experienced team can work with you to create the perfect box for your needs.

Competitive Pricing: We offer competitive pricing for our products and services, ensuring that you get the best value for your money. We believe that high-quality packaging should be accessible and affordable for businesses of all sizes.

Sustainability: We are committed to sustainability and use eco-friendly materials and practices whenever possible. This means that you can feel good about using our boxes knowing that you are minimizing your impact on the environment.

OUR PRODUCTS
REGULAR SLOTTED CONTAINER (RSC)

The common type of corrugated box with flaps on the top and bottom that meet in the center. This creates two layers of corrugated cardboard on each end, providing extra strength and protection. RSCs are versatile and cost-effective and can be customized to meet specific requirements. 

HALF SLOTTED CONTAINER (HSC)

A type of corrugated box with one set of flaps, typically on the bottom. The open top provides easy access to contents, making it ideal for storing and transporting large or awkwardly shaped items. HSCs are often used for retail packaging to allow for easy product display and removal. 

OVERLAP SLOTTED CONTAINER (OSC)

A type of corrugated box with flaps that overlap and provide additional strength and protection to the contents. The overlapping flaps help to prevent the box from opening during transportation or handling. OSCs are used for heavier items or products that require extra support. 

FULL OVERLAP SLOTTED CONTAINER (FOL)

A type of corrugated box with flaps that fully overlap, providing maximum strength and protection to the contents. The FOL is ideal for heavier or fragile items that require extra support and protection during shipping and handling. 

TELESCOPE BOXES

Also known as Two-Piece Boxes, consist of a separate lid and base that fit together. The base of the box has higher side walls, allowing the lid to slide down over the base and create a telescoping effect. Telescope boxes are often used for delicate or high-value items that require extra protection during transportation or storage.

BULK CARGO BOXES

Large corrugated boxes are used for shipping or storing bulk quantities of items. These boxes are ideal for transporting products that are too large or heavy for smaller boxes and can be designed to accommodate various loading and unloading methods, such as forklifts and pallet jacks. 

CUSTOM DIE CUT BOXES

Cut to a specific shape or size, based on the unique requirements of the product being shipped or stored. Die-cut boxes can be created in a wide variety of shapes and styles, including intricate designs with unique features such as handles or compartments or printing.

PIZZA BOXES

Designed to hold and transport pizzas.  Available in a range of sizes to accommodate different pizza sizes, and made from food-grade materials that are safe for direct contact with the pizza and have a ventilated design to allow steam to escape, preventing the pizza from becoming soggy. Can be printed with eye-catching designs or branding.

MAILER BOXES

Designed to be shipped through the mail. They are usually made from lightweight materials and can be easily assembled and sealed using adhesive strips or flaps. Mailer boxes are ideal for shipping small or lightweight products, such as clothing, books, and other small items. They are often used by e-commerce businesses, as they provide a convenient and cost-effective way to ship products directly to customers. 

STORAGE BOXES

They are available in a range of sizes, shapes, and styles to accommodate different types of items, from documents to clothing to large equipment. Storage boxes are typically made from durable materials that provide protection from moisture, dust, and other environmental factors that could damage the stored items. They are also commonly used for long-term storage, as they can be easily stacked and stored in a compact manner.

MOVING BOXES

Corrugated boxes that are designed to be used for moving or relocating household or office items. They are available in a range of sizes, from small to extra-large, to accommodate different types of items. They are also designed to be easily stacked and transported, often with built-in handles for easy carrying. Provide a reliable and convenient way to transport items safely and securely for anyone who is moving to a new home or office.

TRAYS

Trays are flat, rectangular boxes without tops or bottoms, designed for carrying or storing a range of products, such as fruits, vegetables, bottles, cans, and other items. They are made from sturdy and lightweight materials that can withstand the weight and pressure of the products being transported or stored. They are a versatile packaging option for a range of industries, including food and beverage, retail, and manufacturing.

PARTITIONS (OR DIVIDERS)

Corrugated Partitions, also known as Dividers, are inserts that fit inside corrugated boxes and are designed to separate and protect products during shipping and handling. Partitions are custom designed to fit a specific size of the box and provide cushioning and support for individual products, reducing the risk of damage during transit.

CORRUGATED PADS

Flat sheets of corrugated material can be used to reinforce or cushion products within a box, or to provide an additional layer of protection between products during shipping and handling. Corrugated pads are made from sturdy and durable materials that can withstand pressure and resist damage from environmental factors. They come in a range of sizes and thicknesses to accommodate different products.

FOOD CONTAINERS

Eco-friendly and cost-effective solution for packaging food products. Made from recyclable materials, they are a popular choice for environmentally conscious consumers and businesses. Corrugated food containers come in a variety of shapes and sizes and can be designed to meet specific food packaging requirements. They are also lightweight, making them easy to transport and store.

DISPLAYS

An effective marketing tool that can help increase sales and brand awareness. Designed to be eye-catching and visually appealing, they are used to showcase products in a retail environment, such as in-store displays and trade shows. Made from durable and lightweight materials that can be easily assembled and disassembled, making them a practical and cost-effective solution for marketing campaigns.

HAVE A QUESTION, CHECK OUR FAQ’S
We offer a wide range of corrugated box options with different flute types, ECT ratings, and bursting strengths to meet the unique needs of our customers. Check our FAQs to learn more about our options and find the right corrugated boxes for your products.
MORE INFORMATION
How to Choose the Right Corrugated Box Material for Your Needs?
When it comes to corrugated boxes, there are several different types of materials that can be used depending on the needs of the customer. Here are some of the most common types of corrugated box materials:

Single-Wall Corrugated: Single-wall corrugated boxes are made from a single layer of fluted paper material that is sandwiched between two outer liner sheets. These boxes are lightweight, economical, and commonly used for shipping and storage applications.

Double-Wall Corrugated: Double-wall corrugated boxes are made from two layers of fluted paper material and three outer liner sheets. These boxes offer increased strength and durability and are commonly used for heavier or more fragile products.

Triple-Wall Corrugated: Triple-wall corrugated boxes are made from three layers of fluted paper material and four outer liner sheets. These boxes offer the highest level of strength and protection and are commonly used for heavy or oversized items.

At Sign Service Label Products we are dedicated to the trade, providing screen printed & digitally printed labels and decals for over 30 years.

As a wholesale to the trade company you are our sales staff as resellers of our products. This allows us to keep our prices low enabling you to keep your profits high.

Allow Sign Service Label Products to make our success your success, and thank you for the opportunity to reproduce your image.

Self adhesive permanent & removable labels, decals, hang tags, placards, lexan nameplates, signs, and bumper stickers are a great addition to your product offerings.

Who We Are?
A Talent that was digitally inspired to grow with a passion for all things of web and mobile application development.

Code N Coder is a web and mobile app development company headquartered in Leeds, UK. We had a humble but effective start in life, beginning as a small group of three; two being founders of the group and the other a full time mobile app developer on the payroll.

Today, almost a decade later, through determination and a passion for continuous revolving technology, Code N Coder has evolved into a globally renowned digital agency, recognized as a leader in web and mobile app development in the UK as well as Globally. However we initiated from mobile app development to eCommerce development, to virtual reality to augmented reality app development — we offer a wide spectrum of IT services backed by our best app developers and designers.

What makes us unique compared with other web and mobile app development companies in the UK is that we approach every project as an opportunity to deliver bespoke solutions in state-of-the-art technologies. We understand the quality of what our customers are expecting, and we deliver our hard-work to their satisfaction. At Code N Coder, perfection is not just another trait, but a way of life that we have become habitual to.

Above all, when you partner with us, you are shaking hands with a strong ally who can make your digital dreams come true.

Industries We Serve
Bespoke Solutions For Every Industry

Every industry, every business is as unique as a fingerprint. Bulk produced or cookie cut software does not further the business objectives. What your business needs is focused and bespoke digital solutions for diverse use cases. Code N Coder can help with that.

CODE N CODER ERP

Our ERP software are advanced and fully automated. The technology we have used is ever lasting and easy to maintain. We have carefully created a customized dashboard for users and admin

CODE N CODER MARRIAGE HALL

A Marriage software has a very unique features to manage your reservations, keep track of expenses, revenue, history of events, generate invoices and a digital booking system to let your customers be more loyal.

CODE N CODER WHOLESALE

Our Wholesale software is a modern solution that has been more updated with vendors module, items count, total purchase value, dispatch quantity and wholesale items individual count to let you be more focused at your work

CODE N CODER RESTAURANT

There might be many restaurant software, but we have a software having kitchen management, daily revenue or loss count and repetitive customer tracking. A one and only complete restaurant and kitchen management.

CODE N CODER FASHION

A mind blowing fashion industry software help you to be more focused on new arrival, keeping the track of fashion with latest brand, modifying the fashion track, keep an insight of user interests and sales.

CODE N CODER MART POS

In mart, you can't wait for the software to process or even you can use a complex software. Keeping it easier and more enhanced is our approach. All the modern features and a very user friendly interface.

CODE N CODER POS

The Point Of Sale software of Expertezo has latest features to maintain the stock, per day closing and input amount to understand the loss leakage, scan bar codes etc. A nice dashboard, with storage of cloud as well as local based.

CODE N CODER BEAUTY PARLOR

We created the Salon software to keep our local dealers more focused at their work. The software implies the latest technology for the better assessment and insight of customers, repetitive service, invoices and sales.

Western Plastics - Manufacturer of Biodegradable Drinking Straws,
Coffee Stir Sticks & Other Biodegradable Plastic Products
Western Plastics now 
offers all of our popular products in biodegradable materials: biodegradable drinking straws, biodegradable coffee stir sticks, biodegradable cocktail straws, etc.

Established in 1972, Western Plastics is the premier manufacturer, providing the needs for today, and tomorrows, Clients.

Western Plastics offers a broad range of products, manufactured in the standard, or biodegradable, resins for the Plastics Industry. We specialize in Drinking Straws, Sleeves and Coffee Stir Sticks. We have the skill, dedication, and commitment, necessary to create invaluable products for the ever-changing markets.

Wholesale Biodegradable Plastic Products

Western Plastics Inc. was established in British Columbia (BC) Canada over 30 years ago to offer a variety of exciting products within the plastics industry. Our unique products have a universal appeal that are perfect for numerous industries and purposes with clientele ranging from large business corporations and franchises to individual consumer use. We offer our products in bulk and retail pack sizes.

Western Plastics Inc. is pleased to offer Eco-friendly Biodegradable Products that are priced competitively, and have the same mechanical characteristics as our traditional products. The revolutionary Additive formula, when combined with our polypropylene resin, makes our products biodegrade, while maintaining their desired characteristics.

Our Biodegradable Products:

Will fully biodegrade within twenty four months, once disposed with other products (anaerobically and aerobically):
In Landfills.
Submerged in the soil.
In Agricultural and erosion-control settings.
Are recyclable.
Do not require heat, light or mechanical stress to biodegrade.
Do not require special handling.
Do not contain heavy metals (unlike most Oxo-degradable products).
Will maintain the same shelf life as our non-degradable products.
Proudly made in Canada.

We, at Western Plastics, want to partner with you, and achieve our mutual goal for an Eco-Friendly Environment.




	Biodegradable Drinking Straws	
	Biodegradable Coffee Stir Sticks	


	
Western Plastics provides numerous kinds of drinking straws that are great for all occasions, such as clear drinking straws, milkshake straws, cocktail straws, super cocktail straws, mega/bubble tea straws and jumbo drinking straws	
	
Western Plastics offers the first choice in coffee stir sticks that will enhance every coffee encounter. Our coffee stir sticks come in various sizes and packs.	




	Biodegradable Gerbera Sleeves/Straws	
	Biodegradable Dental Straw Aspirators	


	
Western Plastics manufacturers gerbera straws/sleeves that keep the gerbera stems straight. Our gerbera sleeves are available in translucent and green colours.	
	
Western Plastics provides disposable plastic dental straw aspirators to be used with straw tip holders.Our high quality dental aspirators are durable and strong.	




	Biodegradable Sleeves for Tree Core Samples	
	Eco-cycle Floral Nettings	


	
Our sleeves for tree core sampling are sturdy and reliable and made to withstand the handling and transporting of samples.	
	
Our floral nettings are ideal for protecting the delicate Floral petals.	




	Plastic Stakes	
	Paper Straws	


	
Our Plastic Stakes serve many purposes, including posting signs on Lawns. These Stakes are available with either a straight cut, or an angle cut	
	
We are pleased to introduce Certified, Paper Straws, which are available in Bulk and Retail packs!

04 Production

Once your artwork has been approved, it moves into production where it is proofed internally by Quality Control to ensure all aspects of your product match the approved artwork or previous run.

05 Final touches

After your labels have been custom printed, they will move into our finishing department where they are rewound and packaged to your jobs unique specifications.

Delivery or pick up will be scheduled, and you will receive the final invoice from our Accounts Receivable department.

01 Estimate

Our team will provide you with a comprehensive estimate based on label size, substrate, number of versions per size, and total quantity of printed sheet labels or labels for product packaging or boxes.

Once you have placed your order, our team will send an Order Acknowledgement for your approval.

Once approved, we will allocate or order all of the materials needed to complete the print job to your exact specifications.

We’re Experts

We know boxes. Over 40 years of experience. You won’t have a generic online ordering experience. There will be no surprises when you collaborate with us. The last thing we want is for you to be buying boxes from us once.

工事メニュー

蓄電池は、経済産業省資源エネルギー庁が進めている事業の一つです。

蓄電池を導入することで、大規模災害時にも大変役に立ちます。

飛び込み営業で太陽光や蓄電池の営業を受けたら要注意です。

屋根工事の際、太陽光パネルの取り外し、再設置も対応可能です。

埼玉県川越市　Ｓ様　蓄電池取り付け＋太陽光パネル交換

埼玉県さいたま市　Ｎ様　蓄電池取付け

茨城県つくば市　Ｓ様　太陽光パワコン交換　パネル清掃

埼玉県川口市　Ｔ様　エコキュート修理

売電価格が下がるので、自分の家で使うようにしたい。
太陽光設置から、10年近く立つので、一度見直したい。
家で介護をしているため、停電は非常に困る。
太陽光発電のパワコンの調子が悪い。
太陽光パネルを販売、取付した会社が今はもう連絡が取れない。
蓄電池は災害時・停電時に安心!

東日本大震災や北海道の震災、九州の震災など、災害時に最も困ることの一つに、電力があります。電力がないと、スマホ携帯も充電できず、連絡手段も失ってしまいます。しかし、蓄電池があればそのような事態は回避できるため安心です。
※先の北海道大震災でも、家庭用蓄電池が大活躍していました。

電気は売るから使う時代へ!

2019年に約56万件の太陽光発電の固定価格買取期間が終了します。固定価格買取期間が終了した後には売電価格の大幅な引き下げが予想されているため、電気を売らずに貯めて、自家消費したほうがお得になります。
※固定価格買取期間が終了　(卒FIT)について

国家資格保有者による施工！

第2種電気工事士などの国家資格保有者が必ず現場にて施工します。

自社施工だから低価格！

自社施工だから、中間マージンなどの余計な費用が掛かりません。

まじめな工事店です！

メーカー指定よりも、高耐久な材料を使うお客様志向の工事店です!

ごあいさつ

蓄電池、太陽光発電、エコキュートなどのオール電化住宅の電気工事専門の(株)アコードのHPにアクセスいただき、ありがとうございます。私たちは、電気工事店として、は常にお客様の立場に立ち、スタッフ一同、技術力を磨き続けて参りました。 おかげさまで、埼玉県を中心に、創業9年、1,500件の施工実績がございます。これもひとえに施主様、協力会社各位のご協力の賜物です。

埼玉県入間市　太陽光発電設置工事

埼玉県入間市のお客様より、太陽光発電設置のご依頼をいただきました。 電力会社から購入する電気代が年々高くなり続けているので、太陽光発電の自家消費を検討･･･

埼玉県さいたま市　エコキュート入れ替え工事

埼玉県さいたま市のお客様より、エコキュート入れ替え工事のご依頼をいただきました。 半導体不足の影響で在庫が無い中、どうにか工事をすることができました。 ･･･

千葉県　君津市　カーポート設置工事

千葉県君津市のお客様より、カーポート設置のご依頼をいただきました。 以前HPで、太陽光発電・蓄電池の設置工事をご紹介させて頂いたお客様です。 今回設･･･

埼玉県所沢市　ソーラーパネルの撤去　

埼玉県所沢市のお客様より、ソーラーパネルが壊れているため、撤去してほしいとのご依頼をいただきました。 10年前に取り付けたが、発電している様子もないとのこ･･･

埼玉県吉川市　太陽光発電設置工事

埼玉県吉川市のお客様より、太陽光発電設置のご依頼をいただきました。   カーポートの勾配が北に向いていたので、南向きに変える専用の架台を使･･･

東京都青梅市　ニチコンV2H設置工事

東京都青梅市のお客様より、V2Hシステム設置工事のご依頼をいただきました。 V2Hシステムは、自宅の電気⇒電気自動車、電気自動車⇒自宅の電気へと電気を送れ･･･

同じ電気工事でも耐久性に差が出る？

アコードのこだわり
	工事の使用材料が違います!

蓄電池や太陽光、エコキュートなどの設置工事をする際に、配管などの新設をしますが、当店では、メーカー指定のものより、さらにワンランク上の工事材料を使います。
エコキュートや太陽光の設置後の経年劣化は、この設置時の使用材料の劣化に伴うものが大半ですが、当店ではその心配もご不要です。

	電気工事士による工事!

太陽光発電やエコキュートが出始めのころは、資格も免状もない業者による質の悪い工事が問題になりました。私たちが、太陽光やエコキュートの修理に伺うと、トラブルの原因の大半は、安い材料を使ったことによる劣化と、雑な配線工事など。いい加減な工事でした。
私たちは、国家資格第2種電気工事士の資格を持ったスタッフしか、工事をしませんので、そういったトラブルとも無縁です。

	強引な営業は一切しません!

飛び込み訪問営業で、蓄電池のセールスを受けたら要注意です。まず、金額が非常に高額であることと、どの程度の工事をしてくれるかも不透明です。
私たちにも、「飛び込み営業で、こんな見積もりなんだけど・・・」というご相談を頂きますが、大半は、私たちの施工費用よりも1.5倍以上です。強引な営業は一切しませんので、まずはお気軽にご相談ください。

Welcome to our website

BST Loose Leaf is a Canadian manufacturing company. We manufacture different branding/promotional products, seminar kits and presentation materials as well as customizing existing products.

Printed Labels

ORDER YOUR
LABELS NOW

GET STARTED
Personalised Printed Sticky Labels

Welcome to Sticky Labels. We are one of the oldest and fastest manufacturers of printed labels in the UK. We stock a massive range of label materials and finishes and run 10 modern label presses and finishing machines , so can print in almost any size or shape. We can print you perfect labels with a very low lead time - typically one or two days! We don't believe our quality and value is matched by anyone else, and our many thousands of customers seem to agree with us. We are still a family run business and have been printing labels for customers across the world since 1973. We make and stock printed labels in almost any combination of sizes and finishes. Use us for retail labels, security labels, gold, silver, square or round labels and even waterproof labels. Using our new custom label designer you can design a label or sticker from scratch, or you can upload your own design and we will email you a proof so you can order with confidence.

Our Most Popular Products

Die Cut Stickers

Supplied as individual printed stickers - ideal for events or including in mailings.

Waterproof Stickers

A choice of gloss, matt or clear vinyl finishes. Printed in up to 8 colours to give the best quality stickers.

Low Cost Stickers

Our cheapest paper labels are printed in black and supplied on rolls. From 250 labels upwards. Dispatch in just two working days!

Products You Might Like
Our Fluorescent Labels

We print a vast range of fluorescent labels in a wide range of label shapes and sizes. These can be used as warning labels, or just to highlight some instructions on a parcel. We offer several stock label sizes, but can print these in a shape and size to suit your requirements - just contact us or call us on 01205 808460 to discuss your requirements - we're always happy to advise!

Our Glossy Vinyl labels

Our customised waterproof stickers are available in matt or gloss white and gloss clear finishes, and are the perfect option for jobs requiring a custom label shape or size. Each label is printed and cut individually so you really can have the exact label to suit your needs. The labels are fully waterproof so are ideal for outside use.

Our Laminated Paper Labels

Paper labels are usually a great option but they are not necessarily waterproof. We have laminated paper labels with a matt or gloss laminate. These printed labels come on a roll and are best provided in larger quantities.

Bio-Degradable Labels

Elevate your brand with eco-friendly, biodegradable labels. These printed labels are perfect for sustainability-focused businesses as they decompose naturally, ensuring your packaging remains green down to the last detail. These are quickly becoming one of our most popular ranges of labels.

Business Labels

We have been supplying businesses with labels for over 50 years and are aware of the time pressures that often present themselves. We can print and dispatch quality printed labels to you in less than a day so you can meet your deadlines.

Printed Security Labels

Our printed security labels cater to specialised label needs with tamper-evident features. They are available in white tamper-evident or silver void. We offer options like numbering and barcoding, or even printing from a database. The labels come in multiple sizes, and are supplied on rolls or in dispensers with permanent adhesive, starting from 250 labels.

We're fast - very fast! All labels ordered on this website are dispatched within 2 working days.
Most Orders are sent the next working day.
Personalised Stickers and Printed Labels Frequently Asked Questions
Our Range Of Materials

We know that your material choices are essential, and with over 40 years of experience in the industry, you can be sure we have printed them all. When you choose us for personalised stickers, you'll have the following range of material options at your disposal:

Paper Materials
Green Paper
Yellow Paper
Silver Paper
Blue Paper
Gold Paper
Matt White
Vinyl Materials
Yellow Vinyl Fluorescent
Appliance Silver Vinyl Gloss
Void Silver Vinyl Matt
Holographic Vinyl Tamper Evident
Special Finishes
Clear
Matt
Gloss
Metallic Vinyl
Our Adhesives

We have two main adhesive options: water-based adhesive and solvent adhesive. Our solvent-based adhesive is used on labels that might need to be on a while, such as product labels or safety/ equipment labels. Water-based adhesives are used where the solvent adhesive may otherwise cause damage, like on workwear.

Colours

Printed labels work for many reasons, like providing safety information on machinery or warning where danger is lurking. They're also needed for quality products to catch your eye on the shelf. Each of these uses would benefit from a different one of our range of colours, which is why we've committed to providing as many as possible!

Whether you're looking for bright colours to catch a customer's eye, fluorescent day-glow colours that warn of danger or bold colours that deliver the safety message you want, you can be sure we can help.

Where Can Our Sticky Labels Be Applied?

Our custom stickers can be applied almost anywhere! The most common areas of application are:

Smooth Surfaces.
Our quality stickers can be applied to a smooth surface with no problem;
examples of this would be
Laptop stickers
Window stickers
Flat product packaging
Food packaging
Internal packaging
Curved Surfaces.
Not all applications are flat, especially not the glass containers, jam jars and other bottles that labels need applying to.
And how about those stickers for your guerilla marketing campaign? Our printed labels and stickers will adhere to curved surfaces without a problem.

More Information About Our Printed Label Services

Pricing Structure
We pride ourselves on providing an affordable price for a quality finish. We've been in business since 1973, and we understand how important it is to provide value to the tight budgets of small businesses.
We offer some of the cheapest labels on the market but have yet to sacrifice quality. Existing customers know us for our quality custom labels, proven by our 4.8-star rating on Trustpilot.
If you'd like to sample our competitive prices, choose the right product, and we'll give you an instant price at checkout.
Customisation Options We have an unbelievable range of customisation options, from practical, cheap stickers off the shelf to custom-cut products in a range of finishes and shapes. We offer a custom sticker design service available to all our potential customers.

In an easy-to-follow process, our online design tool walks you through ordering your stickers, from choosing the custom shape for your labels to picking the custom size that is just right. One size doesn't fit all, and our custom shape labels allow us to find the right finished label design for your product and even multiple sizes on one run.
Our Printing Process
Our sticker printing service takes place at our headquarters in Lincolnshire.


We print stickers in a variety of ways:
For runs of 10,000 or less, we use the latest in digital printing, which provides extremely low production costs and allows us to provide our leading prices.
For orders over 10,000, we use a flexographic print; though we offset the production costs on set-up and plates with lower rates, it is still very affordable.
What Is The Cost Of Delivery?
We guarantee dispatch within two days, though it is usually next-day delivery. If your order exceeds £35, we'll also offer free delivery.
Our delivery days are Monday - Friday, and orders missing dispatch on Friday will be dispatched to your delivery address on the next working day.
If you would like specific delivery dates on your order, give us a call or ask when placing your order, and we'll be happy to help.

Zenith® Premium Series

Meet the next generation of operable walls: The Zenith® Premium series introduces a seamless ceiling integration to the streamlined straight down deployment and exceptional acoustical performance of the Zenith® Series. Whether you are expanding or dividing a space, the Zenith Premium will blend effortlessly into its surroundings.

Zenith® Series

The Zenith® Series surpasses industry expectations. Zenith has the vertical innovation and acoustical elements found in the Classic™ Series, but with a straight down deployment. The fully automated operable wall combines functionality with aesthetic appeal to help you create a unique space. Zenith movable walls are ideal for areas with limited space, like offices and classrooms. The Zenith features Skyfold’s widest range of STC (RW) ratings to suit your acoustic needs.

Learn More

Classic™ Series

The original Skyfold wall. Easy to use and fully automatic, the Classic™ Series offers state-of-the-art acoustics ranging from STC 51 to 60 (RW 51 to 59) and innovative partition panels that fold vertically in an accordion style, as opposed to Zenith and Zenith Premium’s narrow path of travel. This folding method allows for the Classic to fit in rooms with tall ceilings, such as conference rooms, auditoriums, hotel ballrooms, gymnasiums and convention centers.

Learn More

Mirage®

Let the light shine in with Skyfold Mirage®. Skyfold’s glass partition gives your space a clean and modern look while taking advantage of your space’s natural light. To ensure user comfort, Skyfold Mirage comes in an STC 33 (RW 33).

Prisma™

Not only does the streamlined Prisma let the light shine in, but it does so without the use of any wall or floor tracks, rendering it completely invisible when stored into the ceiling. The elegant glass partition gives your space an extremely sophisticated look with its modern black frame and touchscreen operation. With an impressive acoustic rating of STC 52 (Rw 52), you will have privacy as well as clarity.

NOTRE IMPRIMERIE OFFRE DES SERVICES DE QUALITÉ     
AUX MEILLEURS PRIX GARANTIS AU QUÉBEC     

MANUFACTURIER D’ÉTIQUETTES AUTOCOLLANTES DISPONIBLES PARTOUT AU QUÉBEC

Nous sommes fiers de contribuer au succès d’entreprises en leur offrant des solutions d’impression à la mesure de leurs besoins.

 

Depuis notre fondation en 1986, notre constante évolution nous a permis d’acquérir une réputation enviable pour les entreprises ainsi que les agents manufacturiers et imprimeurs

à travers le Québec.

 

Vous travaillez fort afin d’offrir à vos clients ce qui se fait de mieux sur le marché, il est donc normal que vous vous attendiez à des services d’impression d’une qualité inégalée!

UN SERVICE PROFESSIONNEL AU MEILLEUR PRIX,
C’EST GARANTI

 

Votre satisfaction est au centre de nos préoccupations!

 

Si nous profitons aujourd’hui d’une réputation d’excellence, c’est surtout parce que nous sommes dévoués à offrir à nos clients des services d’imprimerie d’une qualité inégalée.

  

À titre de fabricant, vous pouvez compter sur une équipe d’experts qui prendra le temps de répondre à vos questions et qui vous conseillera les meilleurs produits disponibles en fonction de vos besoins et de votre budget.

 

Nous demeurons près de chacun de nos clients afin d’assurer leur satisfaction et un service personnalisé.

Contactez l’équipe d’Impressions 2001 pour discuter de vos projets et connaître tous nos services d’imprimerie.

Quels que soient vos besoins en matière d’impression, nous vous offrons des solutions sur mesure.

Demandez une soumission dès aujourd’hui!

Imprimerie en constante évolution, nous offrons

TROIS PROCÉDÉS D'IMPRESSION :

FLEXOGRAPHIE (Étiquettes en rouleaux et de tous genres)

IMPRESSION OFFSET(Papeterie et imprimerie commerciales)

IMPRESSION NUMÉRIQUE (Courts et moyens tirages)

FLEXOGRAPHIE ET IMPRESSION NUMÉRIQUE

ÉTIQUETTES DE TOUS GENRES

(En rouleaux, paquets pilés, feuilles ou à  la pièce)

La flexographie est un procédé d’impression rotatif avec plaques en polymère permettant l’impression de toutes les gammes d’étiquettes.

IMPRESSION OFFSET

PAPETERIE COMMERCIALE

(Impression sur presse à feuilles avec plaques en aluminium)

L’offset est la solution parfaite pour imprimer des tirages volumineux et s’adapte à une grande variété de produits!

IMPRESSION NUMÉRIQUE

MATÉRIEL PUBLICITAIRE

(Impression direct sur Xerox depuis des données informatiques)

Le numérique offre la flexibilité que vous recherchez avec un service rapide et efficace! Excellente solution pour petits et moyens tirages.

Sustainably
Curved.

Services Sectors

The most innovative way to curve composite material.
Architecture

bespline enables unique shapes in a range of lightweight, structural materials and finishes — wood, stone, flax fiber, etc. — with thermal and acoustic insulation, fire resistance for exterior facades, interiors, ceilings, stairs, and bespoke applications.

Learn More
Marine

bespline’s Shaped Foam Kits are ≈5X faster to install and save 20-25% weight, while curved laminates and wood veneers without molds reduce costs, lead time and waste for interiors as well as hulls, decks, and other structures.

Learn More
Aeronautics

bespline enables affordable one-off production of projection domes and cockpit simulators, but also opens possibilities for eVTOL and other aircraft interiors and exterior structures as well as propeller blades.

Learn More
Innovation

From customized motocross tracks to novel alternatives for renewable energy, bespline helps to actualize the unique visions of disrupters and innovators as a partner for affordable, sustainable production.

Learn More

Mission Statement

Your world isn't flat
— we can help.

We lower barriers for companies to implement bespoke shapes and solutions using innovative materials, digital automation, and the latest technologies.

Technology

We eliminate the time,
cost, and waste of molds.

Our reconfigurable system creates your CAD file shape in minutes. Our adaptive molding system uses a membrane on top of digitally-controlled actuators to produce smooth singly- and doubly-curved surfaces on which we thermoform, mold, and cure a wide range of materials.

Portfolio Photo Gallery

Shaped Foam Kits enable Boston Boatworks to speed layup and start a new BB series boat every 6 weeks.

Portfolio Photo Gallery

Renowned boatbuilder Lyman Morse used bespline’s Shaped Foam Kits to speed construction and improve properties of a 68-ft composite sailboat hull.

Portfolio Photo Gallery

This composite cockpit is made from 7 vacuum-infused GFRP sections assembled with a metallic frame in several weeks at a fraction of the time and cost of conventional manufacturing.

Portfolio Photo Gallery

The customized curved panels are produced directly from CAD files, produced without a mold, joined and finished to customer specifications.

Portfolio Photo Gallery

Instead of hauling in and out loads of dirt, bespline enables X-Track’s patented approach to motocross with lightweight, modular composite sections with less lead time and cost.

Portfolio Photo Gallery

X-Track motocross sections are curved to order using resin-infused composite structures on aluminum tracks finished with a traction-grit surface.

Portfolio Photo Gallery

For simulators, bespline supplies large, smooth curved surfaces for projecting images without building a mold, saving tens of thousands of dollars and enabling manufacturers to produce one-off units with profit.

Portfolio Photo Gallery

Even for large and complex shapes, bespline produces curved systems per CAD drawings and can attach these to deliver large bespoke structures.

Portfolio Photo Gallery

For this unique stair project, bespline produced 28 custom curved interior and exterior cladding sections which meet ASTM E-84 fire regulations and feature a unique metallic paint finish.

Portfolio Photo Gallery

bespline enables aesthetic but efficient sound dampening that meets ASTM E-84 and UL 94 fire-resistance requirements. Recycled core material can be used to provide more stiffness for horizontal installations.

Portfolio Photo Gallery

bespline is working with leaders in acoustical systems to deliver novel aesthetics, performance and sustainability.

Portfolio Photo Gallery

bespline can shape any kind of foam core, plain or perforated, eliminating the need for cuts which waste resin, increase weight and lower performance.

Portfolio Photo Gallery

Shaped Foam Kits enable Boston Boatworks to speed layup and start a new BB series boat every 6 weeks.

Portfolio Photo Gallery

Renowned boatbuilder Lyman Morse used bespline’s Shaped Foam Kits to speed construction and improve properties of a 68-ft composite sailboat hull.

Testimonials

The innovative manufacturing technology offered by bespline is opening a wide range of possibilities for our domes. By eliminating the tooling cost and related production leadtime, bespline now makes unique design and fast pace projects feasible.

George T. Forbes, CEO, Immersive Display Solutions

Testimonials

bespline’s Shaped Foam Kits allow us to cycle our molds quickly for serial production while saving weight and improving our hull properties — without the time and labor of traditional thermoforming.

Scott Smith, CEO, Boston Boatworks

Testimonials

bespline products are a game changer for the marine industry and offer advantages for many more composites applications.

JP Mouligne, Head Of Sales Americas, Gurit (USA) Inc.

Testimonials

The innovative manufacturing technology offered by bespline is opening a wide range of possibilities for our domes. By eliminating the tooling cost and related production leadtime, bespline now makes unique design and fast pace projects feasible.

George T. Forbes, CEO, Immersive Display Solutions

Testimonials

bespline’s Shaped Foam Kits allow us to cycle our molds quickly for serial production while saving weight and improving our hull properties — without the time and labor of traditional thermoforming.

Scott Smith, CEO, Boston Boatworks

Our Collaborators

At bespline, we consider our suppliers and clients like collaborators to enable, together, what previously wasn’t possible,  affordable, or sustainable.

InstaFoil has been serving the Midwest Communities since 1986.

From the very beginning, we have been committed to providing a full range of services and products, with a level of service and quality that answers to the rigorous demands of the industry. in 2017, InstaFoil Specialties won the Bronze Leaf Award – FSEA for the Most Creative Use of Foil & Embossing.

About the FSEA Award
How can we help you?

We’ll help you find the best pricing based on your project needs.

Contact Us Today
We Do Custom Made
We are one of western Canada’s best equipped and most versatile finishing shops. InstaFoil Specialties offers a plenty of services to help our customers to maximize their creativity and business. If it’s Foil Stamping, Embossing, Die Cutting, or Folding and Cutting, we are here for you.
Create custom packaging and boxes

Transform your brand into a complete package with our custom packaging and boxes, offering full customization, instant quotes, and rapid turnarounds.

We believe that packaging is more than just a container—it’s an extension of your brand. 

We have the ability to accommodate custom folds at Instafoil. Let us help you create packaging that tells your story.

Learn More
Custom Presentation Folders

Achieve a polished and professional appearance with custom folders. Personalize the front, back, and even the pockets to suit your needs. Featuring two inside pockets and an included business card slot, you’ll have all your essentials in one convenient place.

To add a striking finishing touch, consider our foil accent upgrade – it adds a colorful, metallic overlay to details on the front, back, or inside pockets.

Ready to discuss your unique project with us?

Send us a request
Premium Foil Stamping Services

At InstaFoil, we specialize in transforming ordinary designs into extraordinary works of art with our premium foil stamping services. Whether you’re looking to add a touch of elegance to your business cards, invitations, packaging, or promotional materials, our expert team is here to bring your vision to life.

Ready to elevate your brand with our foil stamping services? Contact us today to discuss your project and discover how we can help you create stunning, high-quality designs that leave a lasting impression.

Get Started Today
We Will Help You to Grow your Business
At InstaFoil, we stand behind all of our work. We sincerely look forward to dealing with every potential or returning customer, in the expectation that we can offer a product or service that meets or exceeds their needs!

What is Stock & Ready?

ARMOR Stock & Ready is more than a name, it is an approach. An approach centered on simple ordering, quick turnaround and fast shipping.

LEARN MORE ABOUT STOCK & READY ›
OUR STORY
ARMOR VCI PRODUCTS AND THE TEAM BEHIND THEM TAKE THE
WORK OUT OF YOUR WORKDAY!

Armor Protective Packaging – we’re ERADICATORS OF RUST and we do whatever we can to take the work out of your workday. The ARMOR team takes the business of rust prevention and rust removal very seriously and we apply that same commitment to the ‘business’ of fun. This is our story – it highlights what we do and why we do it – it tells the story of ARMOR VCI (vapor corrosion inhibitor) products and the people behind the ARMOR name.

OUR STORY - WATCH NOW ›
WE ARE AN AWARD-WINNING COMPANY
WHY USE ARMOR VCI PRODUCTS?

Rust happens. If metal is exposed to moisture and oxygen, it breaks down and corrodes. In order to prevent this from happening, you need a protective barrier. Our VCI (vapor corrosion inhibitor) coated papers, films, VCI bags and emitters provide the anti-corrosion protection you’re looking for.

We want to be your partner in solving your specific industrial rust problems. Get in touch with us and we’ll work hard to provide you with the right solution.

GET IN TOUCH WITH ARMOR ›
DEFENDER™ VCI FILM

ARMOR DEFENDER™ VCI Film is a tough-as-nails protection that doesn’t break the bank or mother nature.

Need help in choosing the right board?

ASK FOR HELP

Cutting Board VS Cheese Board. What is the real difference?

The answer is … not much, mainly the intention of the use . Both, our personalized cutting boards and cheese boards are 0.75” thick, come in various styles and sizes. However, the cutting board is primarily used to prepare and cut food while the cheese board is used to serve and share food. Saying that, many of our customers revolutionized that concept and use the cutting boards as serving platters with great pleasure.

Cutting Board VS Chopping Block. What is the real difference?

All cutting boards can handle light food prep work, but the chopping block is meant to handle the heavy duty chopping work – it’s in the name! Straga’s Chopping Blocks are all times kitchen chief’s favourite: being 1.75 inches thick with handles carved on the sides for easy handling and a juice groove to prevent the messy spills in the kitchen.

Both our hardwood cutting boards and chopping blocks are gentle on the knives! So, there are no bad choices.

Due to government pressure to reduce emissions, combined with innovative engineering, more and more power producers continue to build and upgrade facilities to predominantly produce and supply electricity from biomass. Green 2 Blue was founded in 2014 to meet this increasing demand for a cleaner energy alternative to fossil fuels.

With the production of wood pellets made from residual sawdust and wood waste, Green 2 Blue is able to provide a cleaner, renewable fuel to companies that generate and supply electricity. This enables European power plants that were previously fueled by coal to meet their corporate objectives of reducing emissions and ultimately their carbon footprint.

Our mission is to create shareholder value by producing and selling high quality renewable energy products for our customers that improve the environmental impact from power generation.

 

Wood pellets have become a growing source of renewable and sustainable energy generation in the UK and many countries across Europe because they are regarded as having a smaller carbon footprint than traditional fossil fuels and coal. We have also made it possible for all our projects to be constantly moved and relocated by using the services of a trusted company for man with van in East London called Get Man and Van. All our facilities and equipment is being transported when needed by the company cargo fleet safely and securely.

ABOUT US

At Priority Label Products, we specialize in delivering high-quality custom labels and flexible packaging solutions to businesses of all sizes. Since 1998, we have been committed to providing fast, reliable service and innovative printing solutions that meet the ever-changing needs of modern businesses.

​

Based in Toronto, we pride ourselves on being a one-stop shop for all your label printing and packaging needs. From custom product labels to flexible packaging designs, our expert team is here to offer practical, cost-effective solutions with a personal touch.

​

Whether you’re a small business owner launching a new product or an established brand seeking a fresh look, Priority Label Products is your trusted partner in creating packaging that stands out and sells.

    WHY CUSTOMERS CHOOSE US    
AFFORDABLE AND TRANSPARENT PRICING

At Priority Label Products, we understand the value of staying within budget while meeting tight deadlines. Our highly responsive team works with you every step of the way, providing expert guidance to create custom labels and packaging solutions tailored to your needs. Whether you’re a startup or an established brand, we focus on delivering high-quality results at competitive prices without compromising your bottom line.

STRONG CUSTOMER RELATIONSHIPS

We believe that building genuine relationships is the cornerstone of business success. Our team takes a personalized approach to understand your goals, challenges and vision.

By aligning our services with your unique needs, we ensure a seamless experience and long-term partnership that drives mutual growth. With Priority Label Products, you’re not just a client you’re a valued collaborator.

EXCEPTIONAL CUSTOMER SERVICE

Our priority is you. From the initial concept to the final delivery, we’re here to provide hands-on support throughout the entire printing process. Our team takes pride in offering fast, reliable and personal service, ensuring that your custom labels and packaging are delivered to perfection.

We monitor every step of your project to maintain quality, accuracy and timeliness. When you work with Priority Label Products, you can trust us to meet and exceed your expectations on every order.

UNIQUE & VINTAGE-INSPIRED

About Us

Cartolina is a unique gift shop and wholesale greeting card company. Based in British Columbia, we sell vintage-inspired cards and gifts to people and stores all over the world. We have a beautiful retail store at our HQ on historic Baker Street in Nelson, BC and an ever-improving website where you can browse items to be shipped directly to you. Most items you see on social media but not on our website can also be shipped. Just message us at sales@cartolina.com and we'll give you the details! 

The Shop

Built in 1894, the west portion of the Tremont Hotel went through many lives until we acquired the building in 2014. Situated among a collection of beautifully restored heritage buildings on Nelson's Baker Street, the building is a fine example of 1890s architecture - brick construction, stacked cornices, fine masonry detail, pressed tin ceilings and original wood floors.

PULP PACKAGING

Pulp packaging (2Pulp) creates quality custom molded pulp inserts. Our goals are recyclability, affordability, protection, low volume and low cost setups.

Why choose pulp packaging?
Environmentally Friendly

Made from 100% recycled newsprint. Is 100% recyclable and compostable. Each insert is embossed with a Recycle Logo for proper after use disposal.

Space

Inserts are designed to be nested and stacked. This results in massive savings in storage and transportation costs for our clients.

Performance

Our inserts are designed three dimensionally. This allows us to offer superior vibration, impact, and cushioning support than traditional die cut cardboard or foam.

What makes us different?
Low Volume

We are the only company that specializes in low volume inserts. Our clients range from large multinationals to small business owners that are looking for ways to improve their environmental footprint with a great packaging solution.

Lowest Cost Setup

We at Pulp Packaging have created a business to cater to low volume orders. This includes the lowest cost design, setup and molds in the industry. 

Shipping

Shipping is included in the price of our inserts because we are usually not located in your City. We include freight in the cost of our pulp molded inserts. This allows us to achieve the lowest cost all the way to your door and remove all hidden costs. 

Robin at Pulp Packaging designed us an economical solution that made our delicate light bulbs safe and secure while also making the packaging smaller then our previous design.

Our business aims to be enviromentally friendly from start to finish. Therefore, going with pulp packaging was a no brainer and an added touch our customers appreciated.

Recipes

Looking for a convenient, simple and healthy meal or snack when you’re on the go? Wrap It Up Raw will give you energy, essential vitamins, help you meet daily vegetable serving requirements and make you feel great, all while keeping you fuller, longer. Try one of our tried and true recipes today!

view all recipes
    
So delicious

I happened across your product in Creemore and it is so delicious and awesome that you can have a wrap sandwich without wheat, etc.

- Mitch H.
They have become a medicine food

When I originally found your wraps in 2018/2019…i was going through a medical scare in my stomach… 

Now I already, intuitively for years, had cut out white starches, white breads, white rice, gluten etc, as a means to combat inflammation, as I live to be very active, and enjoy sorts constantly. Going though years of competitive sports, had left injuries/ailments, biggest being the knee, with surgery, and arthritis there from my 20’s….now 41. I chose a long time ago, to treat pain, inflammation and otherwise with food, as opposed to synthetic drugs. 

So after overcoming some potentially serious adversity with my stomach issue. It was left very sensitive,  inflamed, and unable to handle many foods, healthy even, because of the digestion, in conjuction with healing process, that was taking place when I would eat. 

Your wraps, were one of the only things, that I ate, wanted to eat, and could eat, anytime of the day, to receive an easy to digest, nutritious, raw organic food, that ultimately, helped me heal , and brought me back into having one of the best years of my life with my wife. 

So while it may have been some placebo in my head, in the sense that, when I know I’ve eaten something low sodium, organic, fibrous, full of goodness, I mentally am convinced I have an edge over time and the elements,but, it wasn’t placebo at all in the end. I had focused on, and believed in your wraps. They returned the favor to me. 

It may sound like a one off story, or overkill, but, if you know me you’d know I’m not one to share my inner emotions to much,or with too many ppl, but, I’am definitely one who’ll push until his last breath. 

Thank you for existing, and creating these wraps, thank you for helping me indirectly, as a result of you producing your product. I’m better for it, blessed, and appreciative , of the positivity they provided my wife and I, both mentally, as well as physically, during that time, and now, in the every day. 

They’ve become a medicine food, in addition to the rest of our diet, that we rely on, and trust, for our lifestyle,  & aiding our bodies & ailments, to maintain/ repair.

- Niko
Simply the most delicious usable wrap

These are simply the most delicious, usable (as in they actually “wrap” without breaking) gluten free etc. wraps I have ever, ever eaten. I have bought wraps that I ended up throwing into the garbage they were so tasteless or they didn’t wrap or they tasted like cardboard….I may have tried them all.

Congratulations, I will be ordering these in quantity for my freezer. Never want to be without. People who have several grain (and nut) restrictions find it hard to know what to have for lunch that is both portable and nutritious and tasty.

 

Thank you SO SO much.

- Morgan VW
Truly Delicious

I’ve had the absolute pleasure of tasting your wraps. I follow a gluten free and vegan diet, therefore wraps that don’t taste like cardboard or fall apart are next to impossible to find. Your product is truly delicious!  I travel around the world (my employment) and I have tried various attempts of wraps and you truly have an amazing product! 

 

Regards,

Carole 

 

- Carole
Nothing else compares

Gluten-free, vegan, healthy, and they don’t fall apart when you actually try and wrap something in them! Discovered these at Rainbow Foods in Ottawa and I’m very glad I did. Nothing else compares.

- Fiona L.
Kids loved your wraps

My kids LOVED your wraps and so did I.  Thank you so much!  It is so difficult to find breads and bread products for children with so many allergies.

- Jennifer L.
I am impressed

I bought your wraps today at the Healthy Cupboard.  I went right home and had one with avocados, tomato, and lettuce.   Absolutely delicious!!!!!  No other condiments necessary.  Wrap was VERY FRESH!!!!!!!!!!  It takes a lot to impress me and I AM IMPRESSED.

- Wanda R.
So delicious

I happened across your product in Creemore and it is so delicious and awesome that you can have a wrap sandwich without wheat, etc.

- Mitch H.
They have become a medicine food

When I originally found your wraps in 2018/2019…i was going through a medical scare in my stomach… 

Now I already, intuitively for years, had cut out white starches, white breads, white rice, gluten etc, as a means to combat inflammation, as I live to be very active, and enjoy sorts constantly. Going though years of competitive sports, had left injuries/ailments, biggest being the knee, with surgery, and arthritis there from my 20’s….now 41. I chose a long time ago, to treat pain, inflammation and otherwise with food, as opposed to synthetic drugs. 

So after overcoming some potentially serious adversity with my stomach issue. It was left very sensitive,  inflamed, and unable to handle many foods, healthy even, because of the digestion, in conjuction with healing process, that was taking place when I would eat. 

Your wraps, were one of the only things, that I ate, wanted to eat, and could eat, anytime of the day, to receive an easy to digest, nutritious, raw organic food, that ultimately, helped me heal , and brought me back into having one of the best years of my life with my wife. 

So while it may have been some placebo in my head, in the sense that, when I know I’ve eaten something low sodium, organic, fibrous, full of goodness, I mentally am convinced I have an edge over time and the elements,but, it wasn’t placebo at all in the end. I had focused on, and believed in your wraps. They returned the favor to me. 

It may sound like a one off story, or overkill, but, if you know me you’d know I’m not one to share my inner emotions to much,or with too many ppl, but, I’am definitely one who’ll push until his last breath. 

Thank you for existing, and creating these wraps, thank you for helping me indirectly, as a result of you producing your product. I’m better for it, blessed, and appreciative , of the positivity they provided my wife and I, both mentally, as well as physically, during that time, and now, in the every day. 

They’ve become a medicine food, in addition to the rest of our diet, that we rely on, and trust, for our lifestyle,  & aiding our bodies & ailments, to maintain/ repair.

- Niko
Simply the most delicious usable wrap

These are simply the most delicious, usable (as in they actually “wrap” without breaking) gluten free etc. wraps I have ever, ever eaten. I have bought wraps that I ended up throwing into the garbage they were so tasteless or they didn’t wrap or they tasted like cardboard….I may have tried them all.

Congratulations, I will be ordering these in quantity for my freezer. Never want to be without. People who have several grain (and nut) restrictions find it hard to know what to have for lunch that is both portable and nutritious and tasty.

 

Thank you SO SO much.

- Morgan VW
Truly Delicious

I’ve had the absolute pleasure of tasting your wraps. I follow a gluten free and vegan diet, therefore wraps that don’t taste like cardboard or fall apart are next to impossible to find. Your product is truly delicious!  I travel around the world (my employment) and I have tried various attempts of wraps and you truly have an amazing product! 

 

Regards,

Carole 

 

- Carole
Nothing else compares

Gluten-free, vegan, healthy, and they don’t fall apart when you actually try and wrap something in them! Discovered these at Rainbow Foods in Ottawa and I’m very glad I did. Nothing else compares.

- Fiona L.
Kids loved your wraps

My kids LOVED your wraps and so did I.  Thank you so much!  It is so difficult to find breads and bread products for children with so many allergies.

- Jennifer L.
I am impressed

I bought your wraps today at the Healthy Cupboard.  I went right home and had one with avocados, tomato, and lettuce.   Absolutely delicious!!!!!  No other condiments necessary.  Wrap was VERY FRESH!!!!!!!!!!  It takes a lot to impress me and I AM IMPRESSED.

- Wanda R.
So delicious

I happened across your product in Creemore and it is so delicious and awesome that you can have a wrap sandwich without wheat, etc.

- Mitch H.

Custom Wine Labels

At Stoney Creek Wine Press, we specialize in providing you with premium custom wine labels that will exceed your expectations. Custom labels provide the perfect way to make your wine truly unique, whether you're creating a Christmas gift for family or for that special someone, or you're looking to personalize the wine for your upcoming wedding, corporate event, or birthday party, your options are unlimited!

Create your own beautifully personalized wine label using one of our easy to use design templates. With hundreds of designs to choose from, you're sure to find the perfect one for your project! We use an advanced digital die-cutting process that allows us to create wine stickers in any shape and size, which means that any label idea is possible.

To get started, simply select a design category from our Label Categories page, and choose from our huge assortment of label templates. Our easy to use label editor makes it easy to personalized your design with your own text and photos right inside your browser.

Not sure if your labels will fit your bottles? Our advanced 3D Wine Bottle Previewer lets you see your wine label designs on a variety of virtual bottle styles and colors while you create your labels. With many 3D bottles styles to choose from including everything from bordeaux and burgundy style to beer and magnum bottles, creating custom labels has never been so much fun!

Are you a designer? Build your own label design from scratch with our Labelmaker Pro wine label design tool, or Upload Your Own Design for us to print. Choose from a huge selection of label shapes and sizes to create your own unique customized wine bottle.

If you cannot find exactly what you are looking for, call us toll-free at 1-866-858-4453 and one of our team will be happy to assist you.

Processors Specializing In Private Label, Retail, Food Service & Bulk

Trader Harris International brings premium certified organic and conventional specialty food ingredients to the market. We are leaders in distributing specialty commodities to food service, retail, bulk and private label clientele in USA, Canada, UK, China, India & Europe. With first hand knowledge of the products and state of the art BRC certified partnered processing plant in Peru, we process numerous commodities that include organic & conventional grains, dehyderated fruits, lentils, pulses and more,  With partners across the globe, we import, manufacture and distribute innovative healthy food products worldwide.
 
We are constantly looking to revolutionize the food industry by introducing new products that will compliment a healthy lifestyle. Our consciousness of fair trade enables us to ensure that appropriate measures are taken at every stage, right from the fields to the manufacturing plant. Certifications are just as important. All our partnered facilities and products carry certifications to match the highest standards. Certifications include BRC, Haccp, ISO, Organic, Kosher, Halal and gluten-free.

​Leaders in Manufacturing and Distribution. Trusted since 1914

LEARN MORE
Welcome to Canadian Mill Nettclean Supply Inc.
	
Canadian Mill Nettclean Supply is single-source distributor specializing in janitorial, safety (PPE), packaging, wiping cloths and sanitation supplies based in Toronto, Canada. We have proudly been in business since 1914, distributing high quality products for over a century. 

​We specialize in providing solutions that save you money by doing the job correctly the first time.

	
All the Supplies You Need to Succeed
Janitorial Supplies
Janitorial products help you maintain a healthy, clean and safe environment. Sanitizing, cleaning, washing, absorbing, collecting and storing are what we do. We carry paper products, cleaning supplies, janitorial equipment, odour control and much more. Let us help you maintain the comfort and safety of your workplace.

Electric Motors

We offer a complete line of electric motors including Canmill fan duty motors, Bluffton Motor Works, Baldor Electric, A.O. Smith, Leeson Electric, Rotom and many other brands. 
Packaging Supplies

Tape, pallet wrap and corrugated products are only some of what we supply to help your shipping and warehouse needs. We are truly a one stop shop for it all.

	
Wiping Cloths
Wipers are used by workers in virtually every department of every industrial facility throughout the world everyday. Industries that are heavy users of wipers include: manufacturing, food processing, printing and automotive. Common uses for wipers include: cleaning tools and surfaces; wiping up small spills; preparing surfaces for painting, staining, or painting; personal wiping such as drying hands or faces.

Safety Supplies
​We distribute a full line of PPE/safety supplies including gloves, masks, sanitizers, goggles, disposable coveralls and much more.
Colour-Coded Products

We specialize in the distribution and implementation of colour-coded systems specifically for food processing facilities. We sell a broad range of cleaning products such as brooms, brushes, shovels, scrapers and more.

Introducing Our Newest Product!
	
Step On Germs is a touchless, foot-activated, stainless steel hand sanitizer dispenser that helps stop the spread of germs, one step at a time. The dispenser is designed to fit either a round of square high capacity 4L jug that's perfect for any high traffic environment.
Proudly made in Canada.

​Life as we know it will be different after COVID-19 and we must take every precaution to ensure our workplaces, homes and cities are safe.

Custom Product Label Printing - Start Here!

Are you searching for premium custom labels to elevate your B2B business? Look no further than Multicolor Labels, your trusted partner in delivering high-quality label solutions. Our wide range of options includes durable labels, reflective stickers, variable data printing, barcode labels, and much more. Let us help you leave a lasting impression on your customers and boost your brand visibility.

At Multicolor Labels, we understand the importance of tailored solutions for B2B customers. Our custom labels are meticulously crafted to meet your unique requirements. Whether you need labels for products, packaging, or promotional materials, our team of experts will work closely with you to create custom labels that align perfectly with your brand identity. Stand out from the competition with labels that captivate your target audience.

For industrial applications that demand durability and longevity, our durable labels and lamacoids are the ideal choice. Designed to withstand harsh environments, our industrial labels offer excellent resistance to abrasion, chemicals, and extreme temperatures. Ensure clear identification, safety compliance, and enhanced efficiency with our premium quality industrial labels.

Your One-Stop Destination for Custom Labels, Engraving, and Industrial Solutions

Welcome to Multicolor Labels, your trusted partner for premium-quality labeling and engraving solutions. We specialize in custom labels printing, offering tailored designs for businesses across various industries. Our comprehensive range includes industrial labels built for durability and efficiency, retroreflective stickers for enhanced visibility and safety, and durable labels engineered to withstand harsh environments. With advanced laser engraving services, we deliver precise, permanent markings on diverse materials, ensuring exceptional results for branding, traceability, and compliance. We also provide specialized WHMIS labels to meet workplace safety and regulatory requirements. At Multicolor Labels, we are committed to delivering innovative solutions that combine functionality with aesthetic appeal, making your business stand out. Explore our services today!

Drive Success with Custom Labels

Visibility and safety are paramount, for which we offer a range of reflective stickers and reflective labels. These highly reflective options are perfect for industries where low-light or nighttime conditions pose potential hazards. Increase safety awareness and minimize risks with our reflective stickers and labels, engineered to provide maximum visibility and durability with superior materials.

Need labels with variable information or unique identifiers? Our variable data printing and numbered stickers services are designed to meet your specific needs. From serialized numbers to barcodes and QR codes, we offer precise and efficient variable data printing options that streamline inventory management, tracking, and authentication processes. Boost efficiency and accuracy with our customized variable data labels.

For applications that require barcode technology, our barcode labels and barcode stickers are the perfect solution. We provide high-quality barcode labels that enable accurate and efficient product identification, inventory control, and supply chain management. With our expertise in barcode printing, we ensure crisp, scannable barcodes that enhance operational efficiency and data accuracy.

Looking for easily removable labels or tamperproof options? We have you covered. Our range includes easily removable labels, warranty stickers, tamperproof labels, and even silver VOID labels and destructible labels for added security and anti-counterfeiting measures. Protect your products and assets while maintaining your brand reputation with our reliable and innovative label solutions.

Premium Custom Labels and Packaging Solutions

Elevate your branding with our custom labels and personalized solutions designed to meet the unique needs of your business. At Multicolor Labels, we specialize in professional label printing and custom stickers that enhance the visual appeal of your products. From high-quality product labels and personalized labels to versatile custom decals and custom tags, our expert team ensures every detail aligns with your vision. Whether you’re looking for innovative label design, reliable results from a trusted label maker, or cohesive custom packaging that stands out on shelves, we deliver solutions that combine functionality with style, giving your brand the edge it deserves.

OUR MISSION

For all your promotional, marketing and printing, we offer a variety of specialized bindery services that are both dependable and reliable. We assist businesses to finished products and offer services in a manner that exceeds their expectations. This includes bringing peace of mind to our clients, by providing the best advice and dependable information for them to select the most valuable solutions to meet all your objectives, however rare and unique they may be.

SOME OF OUR CORE SERVICES
TINNING

Tinning is a method of binding by crimping a metal strip along the top and bottom edges of a sheet of paper, with a loop at the top for easy hanging.

READ MORE

HEAT SEAL LAMINATION

Our specialty is heat seal film laminated. We work in small to medium runs, but can handle large runs too.

READ MORE

DIECUTTING

The process Canadian Calendar uses to diecut is with a steel rule. Steel rule die-cutting is used for larger size dies or where close register is required.

Unique binding.

Up to 20 sheets thick.

Pack Universe
Sustainable Future Starts Here
Your go-to for eco-friendly packaging, timber, recycling, and solar solutions. We fuse innovation and responsibility, paving the way for a better future. Proudly serving the USA, Canada, India, and Thailand – Fueling a Sustainable Revolution!
In 1962
Our journey began under the guidance of the visionary Manmohan Singh, forming the strong roots of our manufacturing expertise. We've been crafting a wide range of products, from Block Pine Wood Packaging Boxes to Heavy Duty Corrugated Boxes, Wooden Boxes, and more. Our dedication extends beyond products – our services cover the entire packaging journey, from designing to smooth logistics. This commitment is firmly built upon a foundation of both quality and sustainability.

And in 2020, we took a bold leap across the ocean to North America, stepping into the global market. This was a significant move, one that saw us not only expanding our horizons, but also planting the seeds of manufacturing units, exporting logs, and establishing yards and warehouses in key spots – Ontario (ON) and British Columbia (BC) in Canada, and New York (NY) in the USA. This step mirrors our passion for excellence, and our dedication to crafting a better world through top-notch packaging solutions.
Mr. Manmohan Singh Tuteja
Chairman
Our History: A Journey of Sustainability
From Forestry to Circular Economy
Since 1995, Packuniverse is more than just a packaging company. We are visionaries on a mission towards a sustainable future, not just for our planet but beyond. In fact, we have even shipped items to outer space using our innovative packaging solutions.Welcome to our universe, where sustainability, speed, and competence converge. Join us on this exciting journey as we revolutionize the packaging industry and make a positive impact on the world we live in.
Our Presence
Pack Universe is a leading provider of sustainable solutions, specializing in packaging, timber, paper/cardboard recycling, and solar solutions. Operating in key countries such as the USA, Canada, India, and Thailand, we deliver professional and eco-friendly services. Explore our offerings designed to make a positive impact on a global scale, as we work towards a more sustainable future through innovation and responsibility.
Our Products & Services
Effortless Packaging
Our packaging services encompass design-to-delivery solutions, ensuring your products receive premium packaging tailored to your needs so that your goods are well protected and professionally presented.

Our expert team specializes in designing, installing, and maintaining solar solutions tailored to your energy needs. Join us in harnessing the power of the sun to create a greener and more cost-efficient future

As experts in timber manufacturing, we have spent years honing our skills and perfecting our processes to bring you the finest timber products in the industry. Explore our wide timber selection for all your requirements.

Explore our comprehensive range of building materials, from premium kiln-dried spruce pine fir to high-quality doors, tarpaulin covers, and advanced rooftop insulation solutions. We're your trusted source for crafting durable, energy-efficient structures.

Industry Recognition
and Affiliations
At Pack Universe, we take pride in our commitment to industry excellence and continuous improvement.
As a testament to our dedication to professionalism and quality, we are honored to be members of two esteemed organizations: The International Chamber of Business and Commerce (ICBC) and the National Hardwood Lumber Association (NHLA). These affiliations underscore our commitment to the highest standards in our field.
Indo Canadian Business Chamber
The Indo-Canadian Business Chamber (ICBC) builds bridges for businesses like ours, connecting us to opportunities and partners across two vibrant economies. As members, we thrive through collaboration, knowledge sharing, and a shared commitment to sustainable growth.
National Hardwood Lumber Association
NHLA sets the industry standard for grading hardwood lumber quality in North America, and as a member of this association, we adhere to the industry's gold standard for hardwood lumber grading and promote its sustainable use.
D-U-N-S® Registered Certificate
Proudly certified with a DUNS number, we demonstrate our commitment to transparency and reliability in business operations, reinforcing our dedication to excellence.
CRISIL
With a CRISIL certification, we proudly showcase our commitment to financial transparency and adherence to stringent credit rating standards, reinforcing our position as a reliable and trustworthy partner in the business landscape.
